loans.name: Celia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “TINKA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Celia; ella tiene 53 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de bazar, ella vende regalos, peluches y adornos y también la socia se dedica al negocio de crianza de cuyes, la socia es su trabajo de bazar trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,y el negocio de crianza de cuyes lo realiza los días fines de semana, por medio de este negocio de bazar y crianza de cuyes saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es ampliar su bazar. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar regalos, peluches y adornos y también para comprar cuyes al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank "TINKA".  The bank is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

The member is Celia; she is 53 years old, married, and has three children.  She alternates her daily activities between her stationary shop -selling gifts, stuffed animals, and decorations- and breeding guinea pigs.  She works at the stationary shop from 8:00 a.m. till 7:00 p.m. and breeds the guinea pigs on weekends.  By means of the stationary shop and raising guinea pigs she manages to advance her children.  Her dream is to expand her stationary shop.  She requests the loan to buy gifts, stuffed animals, and decorations and also to buy guinea pigs wholesale.

She is happy about the loan and she promises to comply with the payments on her account.

loans.use: to buy gifts, stuffed animals, and decorations and also to buy guinea pigs wholesale.

loans.name: Betty

texts.en:
Betty is a 25-year-old married woman with two children who are not in school. She has had a business of selling food at a food stall in Yambio, South Sudan for four years.
Betty is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase beans and rice. She will use her extra income from this loan to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase beans and rice for sale.

loans.name: Santa Rosa Group

texts.es:
Este Comité se formó gracias a una de las miembros, quien se acercó a la Fundación muy interesada en formar un grupo solidario porque en su barrio se había formado uno y quería intentar hacer que funcione. De allí surge el grupo llamado Santa Rosa, el cual está integrado por 13 mujeres muy trabajadoras y luchadoras.
La Sra. Margarita es Presidenta del comité y se dedica a la venta de artículos de mercería, comenta que su negocio es muy prospero, ya que tiene muchas ventas gracias a la buena cantidad de clientes que siemrpe se acercan a su negocio. Una de sus metas es poder seguir creciendo y de esa forma poder seguir ayudando en la manutención de la casa.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas e vestir, zapatillas, calzados, artículos para regalos en general. Agradece a la fundación por la oportunidad de progreso que esta le da.
texts.en:
This committee was formed thanks to one of its members who approached the foundation.  She was very interested in forming a joint group because in her neighborhood one had formed and she wanted to try to make another one work.  From there arises the group called Santa Rosa, which is comprised of 13 hard-working and fighting women.

Margarita is the president of the committee and she sells haberdashery.  She says that her business is very prosperous due to the many sales thanks to the great number of customers who come to her business.  One of her goals is to be able to keep expanding and in that way be able to keep helping with the maintenance of the house.  

She requests the loan to buy clothing and apparel, shoes, footwear, and gift items in general.  She thanks the foundation for the opportunity of progress which it gives her.

loans.use: to buy clothing and apparel, shoes, footwear, and gift items in general.

loans.name: Shakiia

texts.en:
Shakiia is 16 years old and lives in the town of Kalisiso in the Masaka region of Uganda. For the past year, Shakiia has been working hard to manage her small market, which sells food. 

To help expand her business, Shakiia has requested a loan of 400,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more food for resale, and will help Shakiia generate greater profits and pay fees for her sisters. Shakiia hopes that in the future she will be able to start up a retail shop. 

Shakiia is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities, and a forum for life-skills training. The ELA program has increased Shakiia's future prospects by helping her to learn how to save her money.

loans.use: to buy more food for resale

loans.name: Ubaldina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “TINKA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Ubaldina; ella tiene 72 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de restaurant, ella prepara desayunos, almuerzos y cenas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de restaurant. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz, verduras, pollo y carne al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank "TINKA".  The bank is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the providence of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

The member is Ulbaldina; she is 72 years old, married, and has three children.  She alternates her daily activities with her restaurant.  She prepares breakfasts, lunches, and dinners.  She works from 8:00 a.m. till 7:00 p.m.  By means of this business she is able to advance her children.  Her dream is to expand her restaurant.  She requests the loan to buy cooking products such as rice, vegetables, chicken, and beef wholesale.

She is happy about the loan and promises to comply with the payments on her account.

loans.use: to buy cooking products such rice, vegetables, chicken, and beef wholesale.

loans.name: Adrian

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “TINKA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Adrian; el tiene 58 años de edad y es casado y tiene 3 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de bazar donde vende regalos y peluches y también se dedica a vender artesanía como sombreros, pantalones y chompas, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño del socio es ampliar el local donde pueda vender regalos y peluches y también ampliar el negocio de venta de artesanía. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar regalos, peluches y adornos y también para comprar artesanía al por mayor.

 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “TINKA” communal bank, located in the district, province and department of Cusco.
This is Mr. Adrian. He is 58, married, and has three children. He alternates his daily activities with his variety store where he sells gifts and stuffed animals. He also sells handmade items such as hats, pants and sweaters. Through this business, he is able to get his children ahead. His dream is to expand his business to sell gifts and stuffed animals, and also to expand his craft sales. He is requesting this loan for the purchase of gifts, stuffed animals and decorations, and to buy crafts wholesale.
He is happy to have this loan and promises to repay his quotas on time.

loans.use: to buy gift items, stuffed animals, decorations and hand-made items wholesale.

loans.name: Manuel Concepcion

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “TINKA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Manuel Concepcion; el tiene 82 años de edad y es casado y tiene 3 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de restaurant, el socio vende desayunos, almuerzos y cenas, el socio junto con su esposa trabajan en el restaurant, ellos preparan diferentes platos como pollo al horno, estofado de pollo y sopas, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de restaurant, el sueño del socio es mejorar el restaurant. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz, carne, pollo y verduras al por mayor.

 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “TINKA” communal bank. The bank is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.
This is Mr. Manuel Concepcion. He is 82, married, and has three children. He alternates his daily activities with his restaurant business. He sells breakfast, lunch and dinner. He and his wife work in the restaurant, preparing different dishes such as baked chicken, braised chicken, and soup. He would like to expand his restaurant; his dream is to improve his restaurant. He is requesting this loan for the purchase of products for cooking, such as rice, meat, chicken, and vegetables wholesale.
He is happy to have this loan and promises to pay his quotas on time.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for cooking such as rice, meat, chicken, and vegetables wholesale.

loans.name: Georgina

texts.es: La señora GEORGINA, tiene 48 años de edad, la socia continua con su negocio de preparación de bocaditos dulces y salados, la socia prepara para todo tipo de compromisos bocaditos dulces como alfajorsitos en tamaño pequeños, cachitos con relleno de manjar, piononitos, y bocaditos salados como salteñitas, hambuerguecitas enanas y otros, la socia los vende al por mayor desde la docena y el ciento. La socia en esta ocasión desea invertir el prestamo en la compra de ingredientes para la preparación de los bocaditos.
texts.en: Señora Georgina, age 48, is still running her business making sweet and salted snacks. She makes all kinds of snacks suck as small alfajores [a type of cookie sandwich made with dulce de leche], cachitos [croissants] filled with dulce de leche, piononitos [cake rolls], and salted snacks such as salteñita empanadas and mini hamburgers. She sells these snacks wholesale by the dozen and the hundred. Georgina now wants to invest this loan in the purchase of ingredients for making her snacks.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for making snacks.

loans.name: Luci

texts.es:
La señora Lucí se dedica  a la venta de comida hace ya varios años,  vive con su cónyuge el señor Guillermo, actualmente  cuenta con negocio de venta de comidas (almuerzo), el negocio se encuentra ubicado por la zona del parque industrial, se sitúa el mismo en la casa del padre del esposo, le va muy bien con su negocio ya que por que por ser populosa la zona incremento su clientela      
La Sra. Lucí es clienta antigua y solicito el crédito para  la compra de material de construcción para hacer construir un galpón para su negocio ya que es temporada de lluvias y necesita techarlo,  La Sra. Lucí  agradeció por el apoyo que le dio la institución, y también por la rapidez del financiamiento.
texts.en:
Lucí has been selling food for some years. She lives with her common-law husband Guillermo. 

Currently she has a business selling food (lunch). The business is located in the industrial park zone, in her father-in-law's house. Her business is going well as it is located in a populated area which increases her customer base.

Lucí is a repeat client of Emprender asking for a loan in order to buy construction material in order to build a roof protecting her food stand as it is the rainy season and she needs a roof overhead. Lucí appreciates the help the institution gives her and the fast funding.

loans.use: to buy construction material to build a roof over her business

loans.name: Progreso Y Desarrollo Group

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Villa Elisa se unieron 21 mujeres con las ganas de formar parte del programa de mujeres emprendedoras de la fundación paraguaya. El objetivos que tuvieron para unirse ha sido salir adelante y de esa forma poder ayudar a su familia. Ellas se encuentran muy contentas con la ayuda y las capacitaciones que están recibiendo.
Una de las miembros es la señora Maria, quien nos comenta que es modista. Ella hace todo tipo de trabajos en telas, como ser camisas, remeras, pantalones y demás. Ella se define como una mujer muy trabajadora y emprendedora que lucha por darle lo mejor a su familia. Una de sus metas es poder seguir creciendo y poder trabajar con grandes empresas.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de telas, hilos, botones, cierres y demás insumos necesarios para surtir su negocio.
texts.en:
In the city of Villa Elisa, 21 women got together with the desire to be part of Fundación Paraguaya's program for women entrepreneurs.  Their objective in getting together has been to get ahead and in this way be able to help their families.  They are very contented with the help and the training they are receiving.

One of the members is María, who tells us she is a dressmaker.  She does all types of work in fabric, such as shirts, t-shirts, pants, and others.  She describes herself as a very hard-working and enterprising woman who struggles to give her family the best.  One of her goals is to be able to continue growing and be able to work with big companies.

She is requesting the loan to buy fabric, buttons, closures, and other necessary supplies to stock her business.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, buttons, closures, and other supplies.

loans.name: Dora Angelica

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “TINKA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Dora Angelica; ella tiene 38 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de broasteria, ella vende pollos broster con papas, la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 p.m hasta las 12:00p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de brosteria. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar pollo y papas al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank “Tinka.” The bank is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province of Cusco, and the department of Cusco.

The member is called Dora Angelica. She is 38 years old, has a common-law husband, and has 2 children. The member rotates her daily activities. She has a roasting business. She sells roasted chicken with potatoes. She works from 6:00pm until midnight. Through this business the member is supporting her children. Her dream is to expand the roasting business. She is asking for a loan in order to buy supplies such as chickens and potatoes at wholesale prices.

She is happy for the loan and she promises to complete her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as chickens and potatoes at wholesale prices

loans.name: Ofelia

texts.es: La socia es la Sra. Ofelia; La socia continua con su negocio de compra y venta de articulos de bazar, la socia vende regalos, adornos pequeños, vajillas, peluches, juguetes entre otros articulos. La socia desea en esta ocasión invertir el prestamo en la compra de articulos para implementar su negocio.
texts.en:
The member is Ofelia. 

The member continues with her business of buying and selling gift items. 

She sells gifts, small ornaments, dishes, furry stuffed animals, and toys among other items 

The member wants at this time to use the money from a loan to buy supplies to be used in her business.

loans.use: to buy supplies to be used in her business

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “TINKA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio tiene 62 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de broasteria, el socio atiende desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, el socio también trabaja en el área administrativa en la universidad, por medio de este negocio y trabajo el socio saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño del socio es ampliar el negocio de broasteria y mejorar cada vez en su trabajo. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como pollo y papas para la broasteria.
 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank “Tinka.” The bank is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province of Cusco, and the department of Cusco.

The member is 62 years old, has a common-in-law wife and 2 children. 

The member divides his daily activities with his roasting business. He tends the business from 8:00AM until 6:00PM. He also works in the administrative area of a university. Through his business and his work the member is able to support his children. 

His dream is to expand the roasting business and to improve each moment in his work. 

The member is asking for a loan to buy supplies to cook such as chickens and potatoes for roasting.

The member is happy for the loan and he promises to make his payments according to the schedule.

loans.use: to buy supplies to cook such as chickens and potatoes for roasting

loans.name: Luis Carlos

texts.es: El señor Luis Carlos a sus 54 años de edad es un agricultor de cardamomo o “grano del paraíso”, es el fruto de una planta con el mismo nombre. Esta planta, de la cual se consumen solamente sus semillas, es originaria de la India y Sri-Lanka. Gracias a un proyecto de  una entidad de su municipio, el señor Luis Carlos inicio con esta actividad desde hace 5 años y actualmente cuanta con 2000 plantas. Debido al invierno, los cultivos han sufrido deterioro y la producción a disminuido, por lo cual el señor Luis Carlos necesita realizarle mantenimiento a sus cultivos para que se puedan recuperar y así continuar con su labor y poder generar los ingresos necesarios para cubrir las necesidades básicas de su familia.
texts.en: Mr. Luis Carlos is  a  54-year-old farmer who grows cardamom or "grain of paradise" which is the fruit of a plant with the same name. This plant, of which only the seeds are consumed, is native to India and Sri-Lanka. Thanks to a project of an organization in his municipality, Mr. Luis Carlos started growing Cardamom  5 years ago  and currently has  2000 plants. Due to the winter weather,  crops have suffered and harvesting has declined. This is the main reason Mr. Luis Carlos needs to do maintenance on his crops so that they can recover and  he can continue with his work and generate enough income to cover his family's basic needs.

loans.use: To maintain the soil  for the growing of Cardamom plants, to buy fertilizer and to pay for labor costs.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “TINKA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia tiene 32 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de adornos para la navidad, ella vende en forma ambulatoria desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, la socia también trabaja en una empresa privada, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los adornos de navidad. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar adornos para navidad como luces navideñas al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the TINKA communal bank in the Cusco district, Cusco province, Cusco department.  She is 32 years old, married, and has three children.  She alternates her daily activities with her business of selling Christmas decorations.  She sells in an itinerant manner from 8:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m.  She also works for a private company.

Her dream is to have a place where she would be able to sell her Christmas decorations.

She is happy about the loan, and she pledges to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy Christmas decorations like lights wholesale.

loans.name: Felipa

texts.es:
La señora Felipa tiene 57 años de edad, está casada con el señor Pedro quien tiene 62 años, ambos de la ciudad de Caacupé. La pareja tiene 3 hijos, todos mayores de edad e independientes.
Felipa cuenta que tiene una surtida despensa en su domicilio, desde hace ya 5 años. Ella trabaja mucho  pero también tiene necesidad de mejorar, para que de esa forma pueda ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes. Ella desea algún día tener un mini super donde tenga más variedad y de esa forma poder atraer a más clientes.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de azúcar, yerba, arroz, fideos, enlatados y demás insumos de primera necesidad, lo cual le ayudará a poder surtir su negocio y de esa forma estar preparada para la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Felipa is 57 years old. She is married to Pedro who is 62 years old. Both are from the city of Caacupé, She has three children, all of them adults and independent.

Felipa has had a diverse stockroom in her home for the last 5 years. She works a lot but still needs to improve, so that she can offer a better service to her customers. She wants someday to have a mini market where she can have a greater variety and attract more clients. 

She is asking for a loan to buy sugar, yerba (leaves from mate plant used for a popular tea-like beverage), rice, noodles, and canned goods and other supplies of basic needs, which will help her supply her business and so be ready for her client’s requests.

loans.use: to buy sugar, yerba, rice, noodles, and canned goods and other supplies

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan Carlos tiene 21 años es soltero vive con los padres y no tiene  hijos. Vive en el Recinto Las Blancas en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

Ventanilla 26 DE NOVIEMBRE  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Las Blancas, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.

Juan Carlos se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul realiza las compras de sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado de Ventanas.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos como urea, insecticidas entre los más usados  para el cuidado de los cultivos. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos de la familia y para invertir en la siembra en semillas e insumos.  Su sueño es comprar un terreno para seguir sembrando.
En los tiempos libres le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos is 21 years old, single, and lives with his parents.  They live in the Las Blancas settlement in the Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.

This community bank is called "26 de Noviembre" and it is located in Las Blancas in Ventanas canton. The members of the communal bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice and pigeon peas.

Juan is a farmer. In particular, he grows corn, rice and pigeon peas. He makes his purchases in Ventanas every month and makes his sales in the market in Ventanas.

Juan is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, manure like urea and, insecticides; which are what he uses the most to take care of his crops.  

The loan has helped him increase the family income.  It is also used for planting seeds and for supplies.

His dream is to buy a plot of land in order to continue sowing.

In his free time he likes to play sports.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, manure like urea and, insecticides; which are what he uses the most to take care of his crops.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “TINKA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Virginia; ella tiene 36 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de broasteria, la socia vende pollo broster con papas desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el local de brosteria. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como pollo y papas al por mayor. 

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Virginia belongs to the TINKA communal bank, which is in the Cusco district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

Virginia is 36 years old, in a common-law marriage, and has two children.  She alternates her daily activities with her business of selling broasted chicken with potatoes.  She works from 8:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m.  It is through this business that she gets her children ahead.

Her dream is to expand the locale where she sells broasted chicken.

She is happy about the loan, and she pledges to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy wholesale products like chicken and potatoes to use when cooking.

loans.name: Victoria Eloisa

texts.es:
Victoria Eloisa tiene 48 años es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos. Vive en el Recinto Las Blancas en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

Ventanilla 26 DE NOVIEMBRE  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Las Blancas, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.

Victoria se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul realiza las compras de sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado de Ventanas.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos como urea, insecticidas entre los más usados  para el cuidado de los cultivos. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos de la familia y para invertir en la siembra en semillas e insumos.  Su sueño es viajar a Europa, tener una casa y que los hijos terminen los estudios.

En los tiempos libres disfruta mucho escuchar música.
texts.en:
Victoria Eloisa is 48 years old and married.  She lives with her husband and children in the Las Blancas settlement in the Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province. 

This community bank is called "26 de Noviembre" and it is located in Las Blancas, in Ventanas canton. The members of the communal bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice and pigeon peas.

Victoia is a farmer, and she grows corn, rice and pigeon peas.  She buys her products in Ventanas, and and she sells her products in the market in Ventanas.

The requested loan is to buy seeds, fertilizers, manure like urea and, insecticides, which are what she uses the most to take care of her crops.  

The loan has helped her increase the family income.  It is also used for planting the seeds and for supplies.

Her dream is to travel to Europe, have a house, and that her children complete their education.

In her free time she really enjoys listening to music.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, manure like urea and, insecticides.

loans.name: Petrona

texts.es:
Petrona nació en el departamento de Puno pèro actualmente radica en el poblado de Rumichaca baja. Este pueblo se localiza en el distrito de Urubamba, provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco, Perú. 

Petrona tiene 53 años edad y es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene ocho hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de comida típica en uno de los mercados más populares de la ciudad de Urubamba, ella tiene 28 años preparando diferentes platos típicos como por ejemplo pollo frito, trucha frita, tallarín con pollo, rocoto relleno, caldo de cabeza, adobo, chuleta frita, papa a la huancaína, habas hucho, chiriuchu y otras más, ella empieza su trabajo desde muy temprano pero sale a vender a partir de las 8 de la mañana y hasta la una de la tarde o hasta que se acabe el ultimo plato de comida, ella también tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes en su domicilio.  Ya son varios años que se dedica  a los negocios y le va muy bien. Petrona en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar más mercadería para poder abastecer su tienda de abarrotes y también para comprar insumos para preparar más platos de comida. 

Petrona es integrante del grupo “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja” lo conforman 19 socios que viven en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja y donde realizan sus actividades económicas.
texts.en:
Petrona was born in Puno department, but currently she resides in the settlement of Rumichaca Baja. This village is located in the district of Urubamba, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department, Peru. Petrona is 53, married, and has eight children.

She sells traditional food in one of the most popular markets in the city of Urubamba. She has been preparing various traditional dishes for 28 years, such as fried chicken, fried trout, chicken with noodles, stuffed peppers, sheep's head soup, adobo (spicy pork), fried chops, huancaína potatoes, huacho lima beans, chiriuchu (a dish made from corn tortilla, chicken, toasted corn, pork sausage, cheese and baked guinea pig), and others. 

She starts work very early, and goes out to sell from eight in the morning to one in the afternoon or until the last plate of food is finished. She also has a small grocery store in her home. She has been working in her businesses for several years now, and it's going very well.   

On this occasion, Petrona needs the loan to buy more merchandise for stocking her grocery store, and also to buy ingredients for making her food dishes. 

Petrona is a member of the "Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja" communal bank, made up of 19 members who live in the settlement of Rumichaca Baja, where they carry on their businesses.

loans.use: To buy more merchandise.

loans.name: Senaida

texts.es:
Senaida nació en la provincia de Urubamba pero vive en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja. Este pueblo se localiza en el distrito de Urubamba, provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco, Perú. 

Senaida tiene 32 años edad y es casada y fruto de hermosa relación tiene tres hijos, ella tiene diferentes actividades económicas que son la venta de verdura, la venta de chicha y engorde de ganado. Ya son cuatro años que se dedica a la crianza de animales y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Senaida es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que saca adelante a su familia. En  esta oportunidad Senaida requiere el préstamo para comprar una ganado que cuesta S/. 450.00 nuevos soles pero ella lo hace engordar durante dos años y después lo vende a S/. 1800.00 nuevos soles. 

Senaida es integrante del grupo “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja” lo conforman 19 socios que viven en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja y donde realizan sus actividades económicas.
texts.en:
Senaida was born in the province of Urubamba but lives in the village of Rumichaca Baja. This village is located in the district of Urubamba, province of Urubamba and department of Cusco, Peru.

Senaid is 32 years old, married and they have three children. She has different ways of earning a living and they are selling vegetables, selling chicha (drinks made from fermented corn) and fattening up livestock. She has been raising animals for 4 years and is doing very well thanks to the struggle she puts into her work. Senaida is a hardworking entrepreneur that supports her family. At this time Senaida is asking for a loan in order to buy livestock. It costs 450 soles and it takes two years to fatten an animal that she can sell for 1800 soles. 

Senaida is a member of the group The Sunflowers of Rumichaca Baja which is made up of 19 members who live in the city of Rumichaca Baja where they carry out their economic activities

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Juan Roberto

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “TINKA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Juan Roberto; el tiene 19 años de edad y es soltero; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el estudio en la universidad, el socio estudia la carrera de psicología, el socio estudia desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, el sueño del socio es salir profesional en la carrera de psicología. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar un televisor para implementar su casa.

 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Juan Roberto, 19, belongs to the “Tinka” communal bank that’s located in Cusco District belonging to Cusco Province and Cusco Department.  He’s single and alternates his daily activities with his university classes.  He is studying Psychology.  He attends classes from 7am until 6pm and his dream is to become a professional psychologist.  He is asking for the loan to buy a television set for his house.  He is happy about the loan and commits to make his installment payments.

loans.use: to buy a television set.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “TINKA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Gloria; ella tiene 33 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de verduras, la socia vende zanahorias, tomates, cebollas, pepinos y papas, ella vende en el mercado desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, por medio de este pequeño negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de verduras. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar verduras como tomates, zanahorias, tomates y lechugas al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Gloria, 33, belongs to the “Tinka” communal bank that’s located in Cusco District belonging to Cusco Province and Cusco Department.  She has a spouse and two children.  She alternates her daily chores with a business selling vegetables.  She sells carrots, tomatoes, onions, cucumbers and potatoes in the market from 9am until 5pm and is able to support her children with this small business.  She wants to expand and improve the vegetable selling business and is asking for a loan to buy vegetables like tomatoes, carrots, tomatoes and lettuce at wholesale.  She is happy about the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy vegetables at wholesale.

loans.name: Luz Fanny

texts.es: La señora Luz Fanny ha sido comerciante desde hace 20 años, con el fruto de sus actividades ha logrado sacar adelante a su familia ya que ha sido la jefe de su hogar desde hace muchos años cuando se separó del padre de sus 3 hijos. Desde hace dos años tiene un pequeño almacén en su casa en el cual vende ropa y calzado para toda la familia, para el cual necesita de compra de surtido para poder cumplir con varios encargos que tiene para varios de sus clientes y que no ha podido efectuar por falta de capital de trabajo. El sueño de la señora Luz Fanny es poder ampliar su almacén y brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Luz Fanny has been a merchant for 20 years.  With the fruits of her labor she’s managed to raise her family since she’s been head of household for many years since she and her three children separated from her husband.

For the last two years she’s had a small store at home where she sells clothes and footwear for the entire family.  She needs to buy assorted stock for it to be able to fill pending orders she has for several of her customers and that she’s been unable to fulfill for lack of working capital.

Luz Fanny’s dream is to be able to expand her store and provide her children with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy women's and men's clothes.

loans.name: Yackelin

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “TINKA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Yackelin; ella tiene 20 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de salchipapas que es un plato a base de salchichas y papas fritas, ella tiene un carrito salchipapero donde salchipapas en forma ambulatoria, la socio por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender la salchipapas. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar papas y salchichas al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Yackelin, 20, belongs to the “Tinka” communal bank that’s located in Cusco District belonging to Cusco Province and Cusco Department.  She is single and alternates her daily activities with a business selling “salchipapas” which is a dish based on sausages and fried potatoes.  She has a salchipapas cart that she uses to sell salchipapas in an itinerant manner.  She wants to get ahead by means of this business.  Her dream is to have a locale where she can sell the salchipapas.  She’s requesting a loan to buy potatoes and sausages at wholesale.  She is happy about the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy potatoes and sausages at wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy clothes for subsequent resale.

loans.name: Luisa Del Rosario

texts.es:
Luisa Del Rosario tiene 42 años es casada vive con el esposo y  con los  hijos. Vive en el Recinto Las Blancas en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

Ventanilla 26 DE NOVIEMBRE  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Las Blancas, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.
Luisa se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul realiza las compras de sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado de Ventanas.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos como urea, insecticidas entre los más usados  para el cuidado de los cultivos. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos de la familia y para invertir en la siembra en semillas e insumos.  Su sueño es tener un terreno propio.

Le gusta ser una persona responsable y puntual.
texts.en:
Luisa Del Rosario, 42, is married and lives with her husband and children in Recinto Las Blancas in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.

The “26 de Noviembre” communal bank is located in Recinto Las Blancas belonging to Ventanas Canton.  This communal bank is dedicated to farming tasks in short cycle corn, rice and pigeon peas.

Luisa farms corn, rice and pigeon peas.  Her purchases take place in Ventanas and her sales in the Ventanas market.

She requested the loan to buy seeds, fertilizer and manure like urea and the most commonly used insecticides for crop care.  The loan helped her to increase family income and to invest in seeds and supplies.  Her dream is own her own field.  She likes to be a responsible, punctual person.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Cornelia

texts.es: La señora CORNELIA, la socia continua con su negocio de preparación de pollipapas (comida peruana que consta de papas y un trozo de pollo); la socia compra papas y pollos al por mayor y los prepara en la mañana, ella condimenta los pollos y pela las papas y prepara todo lo referente para la praparación de la venta de pollipapas. La socia desea invertir el prestamo en la compra de pollo y papas.
texts.en: Cornelia continues with her business making “Pollipapas” (Peruvian dish consisting of potatoes with a piece of chicken).  She buys potatoes and chickens at wholesale and prepares the dish in the morning.  She spices the chicken and peels the potatoes and prepares everything needed for the preparation and sale of pollipapas.  She wants to use the loan to buy chicken and potatoes.

loans.use: to buy chicken and potatoes.

loans.name: Dipa

texts.en:
Dipa is 28 years old. She is married and has one child who is ten years of age. In 2003, Dipa established her grocery store business. She supports her family working long days. She has already received and successfully repaid five loans from Patan BPW. Dipa used her most recent loan to buy goods for her grocery store. In the future, Dipa hopes to uplift her family's economic conditions. She thanks you for your support. 

In the Kathmandu Valley, small grocery stores, called a pasal, are an important part of the local economy. Fresh produce, milk, and staples such as rice, lentils, and flour are purchased daily for cooking in the home. Owners of small grocery stores use Kiva loans to increase their purchasing power and profit margins. By keeping inventory strong and purchasing in larger amounts, owners of these small stores are able to increase their profitability. While a typical pasal might be no more than 100 sq. feet, they are always full of bargaining customers, deliveries, and shrewd businesswomen.

loans.use: to buy goods for her grocery store

loans.name: Maria Eusebia

texts.es:
María Eusebia  tiene 46 años es casada vive con el esposo  y  con los  hijos. Vive en el Recinto Las Blancas en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

Ventanilla 26 DE NOVIEMBRE  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Las Blancas, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.

María Eusebia  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul realiza las compras de sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado de Ventanas.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos como urea, insecticidas entre los más usados  para el cuidado de los cultivos. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos de la familia y para invertir en la siembra en semillas e insumos.  Su sueño es tener una casa.

Le gusta cuidar de su hogar y realizar la limpieza de la casa.
texts.en:
María Eusebia, 46, is married and lives with her husband and children in Recinto Las Blancas in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.

The “26 de Noviembre” communal bank is located in Recinto Las Blancas belonging to Ventanas Canton.  This communal bank is dedicated to farming tasks in short cycle corn, rice and pigeon peas.

María Eusebia farms corn, rice and pigeon peas.  Her purchases take place in Ventanas and her sales in the Ventanas market.

She requested the loan to buy seeds, fertilizer and manure like urea and the most commonly used insecticides for crop care.  The loan helped her to increase family income and to invest in seeds and supplies.  Her dream is to own a house.  She likes taking care of and cleaning her house.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Norma

texts.es:
Norma nació en la provincia de Urubamba pero vive en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja. Este pueblo se localiza en el distrito de Urubamba, provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco, Perú. 

Norma tiene 27 años edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos, ella trabajó en cerámicas seminarios pero tuvo que renunciar porque no había quien cuide a sus hijos por lo tanto ahora se está dedicando a la casa, ella también se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como pollos, ella comprar sus animalitos en una de las ferias de la ciudad del Cusco cada par comprar a S/. 14.00 nuevos soles y durante tres meses los engorda y después los vende cada pollo a S/. 45.00 nuevos soles. En esta oportunidad Norma requiere el préstamo para comprar pollos. 

Norma es integrante del grupo “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja” lo conforman 19 socios que viven en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja y donde realizan sus actividades económicas.
texts.en:
Norma was born in Urubamba Province but lives in the town of Rumichaca Baja.  This town is located in Urubamba District, Urubamba Province and Cusco Department, Perú.

Norma is 27 years old and is in a common law relationship; she has two children.  She used to work at Cerámicas Seminarios but had to resign because she had no one to take care of her children so now she is dedicated to her home.  She also raises small farm animals like chickens.  She buys her little animals in one of Cusco’s street markets for 14 new soles each and fattens them up for three months and then sells each chicken for 45 soles.  

On this occasion, Norma needs the loan to buy chicks.  Norma is a member of the “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja” (Rumichaca Baja Sunflowers) communal bank that has 19 members living in the town of Rumichaca Baja where they carry out their economic activities.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Sarita

texts.en:
Sarita is 30 years old.  She is married and has one child who is 11 years of age. In 2004, Sarita established her tailoring business. She supports her family working seven days a week and 10 hours a day. She has already received and successfully repaid five loans from Patan BPW. Sarita used her most recent to buy raw materials for her business. In the future, Sarita hopes to uplift her family's economic conditions. She thanks you for your support. 

In the Kathmandu Valley, clothing is made to order. Tailor stalls line the streets where store owners sell materials and work on their sewing machines.  These skilled tailors make school uniforms for children as well as the the traditional women's kurta surwal and men's daura surwal. With a Kiva loan, BPW borrowers are able to purchase additional cloth material or sewing machines that will increase production and profitability.

loans.use: to buys raw materials for her tailoring business

loans.name: Kuña Katupyry Group

texts.es:
Kuña Katupyry se llama el grupo formado en la ciudad de Itá, ellas son mujeres muy trabajadoras y tienen la esperanza de que por medio de la fundación paraguaya y sumado al trabajo de cada una puedan salir adelante y ayudarse.
Una de las miembros es la señora Maria, quien se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de joyas. Ella comenta que tiene buena clientela ya que siempre recibe muchos pedidos y eso la ayuda a tener los medios necesarios para poder mantener a su familia. Una de sus metas es tener un negocio grande donde pueda vender sus joyas.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de pulseras, cadenas, anillos y demás tipos de joyas con las cuales podrá cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
“Kuña Katupyry” is the name of the group formed in the city of Itá.  They are very hardworking women who hope through Fundación Parguaya and through the work each one of them does to be able to get ahead and help each other.

One of the members is María who sells all types of jewelry.  She comments that she has a good clientele because she always gets many orders and this helps her to have the necessary means to support her family.  One of her goals is to have a large store where she can sell her jewelry.

She asks for the loan to buy bracelets, chains, rings and other types of jewelry to meet customer demand.

loans.use: to buy jewelry.

loans.name: Inversión Group

texts.es:
Este Banco comunal se llama “Inversión” está conformado por 18 emprendedores, quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros entre los cuales se encuentran negocios de venta de ropa, venta de artículos de bazar, venta de helados y maestros de construcción. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Valparaíso. 
Cristian presidente del grupo del Banco comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra al final del grupo, en la última fila, pero es el primero de derecha a izquierda, vistiendo una camisa a cuadrillé color celeste y quien además tiene su brazo arriba.
Se dedica al rubro de la soldadura, él trabaja con estructuras metálicas las cuales utiliza para construir. 
Trabaja en éste oficio desde hace 10 años, además trabaja de manera dependiente, por lo que flexibiliza su horario, trabajando 4 días a la semana. 
Sus clientes van a su domicilio particular y solicitan sus servicios de soldadura. 
Por ahora trabaja en un pequeño taller que habilitó en el patio de su casa. Ahí cuenta con diferentes herramientas entre las cuales se encuentran una galletero (herramienta para cortar diferentes tipos de materiales), serrucho eléctrico, maquina soldadora, entre otros. 
Sus insumos para soldar los compra en grandes distribuidoras.
Con el crédito comprará un taladro percutor para sus construcciones.
Una de sus metas es tener un taller grande en algún galpón y fuera de su casa.
Cristian vive junto a su esposa y sus cuatro hijos, quienes estudian y asisten al colegio. Él es el jefe de hogar.
Uno de sus sueños es que sus hijos sean profesionales de ésta manera tendrían una mejor estabilidad económica.
Cristian está muy agradecido de la oportunidad brindada por Fondo Esperanza, ya que le ha permitido comprar diversas herramientas para su negocio. El cual ha ido en aumento. Además comenta que la ayuda también ha sido de manera integral por las capacitaciones realizadas, aprendizajes que ha incorporado en su negocio. 
Valparaíso está situado a 120 kilómetros al noroeste de Santiago. Es la capital regional y además sede del poder legislativo del país. Es el primer puerto de la nación y ofrece gran variedad de lugares hermosos y pintorescos, como por ejemplo la casa del poeta Pablo Neruda, ganador del Premio Nobel.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called Investment. It has 18 members who are entrepreneurs working in different fields. Some of these are clothing sales, gift items, ice cream sales, and construction masters. All of them live in the city of Valparaíso.

Christian is president of the communal bank group, and in the photo can be found in the back row, at the end, in the plaid shirt, with his hand reaching upwards.

He works in the field of welding. He works with metal structures that are used for construction. He has been in this work for 10 years. He also works independently, with a flexible schedule, working 4 days a week. His clients go to his home address and ask for his welding services.

Fo now he works in a little workshop that is set up in the patio of his house. There he has his tools among which are a galletero (a tool to cut various types of materials), an electric saw, and a welding machine among others. He buys his welding supplies from large distributors.

With the money from the loan he will buy a hammer/percussion drill used in construction. 

One of his goals is to have a large workshop with some kind of roofing outside his house. Christian lives with his wife and his 4 sons who are school students. He is the head of the household. One of his dreams is that his children become professionals so that they have more economic stability.

Cristian is very pleased with the opportunity offered by Fondo Esperanza as it has permitted him to buy different types of tools for his business which has been expanding. He also says that what he has learned through the communal bank training has become a part of his business as he puts to use what he learns.

Valparaíso is located 20 kilometers northwest of Santiago. It is the regional capital and the seat of legislative power of the country. It is the main port of the nation and offers a great variety of beautiful and picturesque places, for example the house of the poet Pablo Neruda, winner of the Nobel Prize.

loans.use: to buy a hammer/percussion drill used in construction

loans.name: Guldasta

texts.en:
Guldasta is a 46-year-old single woman living with her parents. She grows fruits and vegetables in the garden. She started this business four years ago. She chose this field because fresh fruits and vegetables are very popular in Azerbaijan. People like to eat them fresh and make fresh juices which is very healthy. She sells her crops in the central bazaar and her monthly income is 300 Azerbaijani manats (AZN). Raising crops takes a lot of strength and means working in the open air, which is very hard for women. Guldasta is a very strong woman and has the potential to work even harder to produce more crops.

Guldasta needs additional capital to invest in seeds and fertilizers. This will allow her to improve the quality of the products she grows and increase monthly turnover. For this purpose, she applied for a 1000 AZN loan.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Perfecto Alberto

texts.es:
Perfecto Alberto  tiene 65 años es soltero vive con la hija. Vive en el Recinto Las Blancas en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

Ventanilla 26 DE NOVIEMBRE  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Las Blancas, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.
Perfecto Alberto  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul realiza las compras de sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado de Ventanas.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos como urea, insecticidas entre los más usados  para el cuidado de los cultivos. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos de la familia y para invertir en la siembra en semillas e insumos.  Su sueño es ayudar a la familia para que tengan la comida diaria.

Le gusta descansar y pasar con la familia.
texts.en:
Perfecto Aberto is 65 years old, single and lives with his daughter. They live in Recinto Las Blancas in the canton of Ventanas in the province of Los Ríos.

The communal bank 26 de Noviembre is located in Recinto Las Blancas, belonging to the canton of Ventanas, and in this area they plant short-cycle crops of corn, rice and pigeon peas.

Perfecto Alberto is a farmer growing corn, rice, pigeon peas and he buys his supplies in Ventanas and sells his crops at the Ventanas market.

He will use the money from this loan to buy seeds, fertilizer and compost such as urea, and the widely used insecticides for the care of crops. The loan helps him to increase the family income and to buy seed and supplies. 

His dream is to help the family to have food every day. He likes to rest and to spend time with his family.

loans.use: to buy seed, fertilizer, compost such as urea, and insecticides

loans.name: Zumrud

texts.en: Zumrud is a 46-year-old married woman with two children. She's been growing seasonal fruits and vegetables for the last 7 years. During autumn, winter and spring she primarily grows pumpkins. Pumpkin is a very popular product, and people consider it as one of the healthiest. People use it in national dishes such as qutab and pilau. One of the main positive features of pumpkin is that it can stand for more than two months and not rot. Zumrud usually sells her crops in the central bazaar as well as to neighbors. Her monthly income is 350 Azerbaijani manats (AZN). Now Zumrud wants to increase the number of products she sells. She needs additional capital to invest in her business to buy seeds and fertilizers. AqroInvest Credit Union provided her with a 1000 AZN loan.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Luz

texts.es:
Luz, de 24 años de edad, es una mujer alegre y trabajadora, además de ser muy amable y trato jovial. Convive con Elías quien es cocinero. Viven juntos a lado de su hermana y su hijo de 2 años de edad, instalados en su propia casa. El negocio que tiene Luz es la venta de abarrotes en general, para eso abrió un bodega en su propia casa. Negocio que aprendió de su padre, quien tenía su bodega en su casa, y contando con un apoyo financiero de MFP comenzó con éste negocio comprando productos en pequeñas cantidades , logrando crecer así su tienda durante estos 04 años que viene funcionando, y que hasta el momento lo hace sola.
Le gusta su negocio pues le permite estar en casa para poder atender a su pequeño hijo, así como los ingresos económicos que le sirven para comprar lo que le falte para su hogar, sin embargo no le gusta es que algunos de sus clientes le piden crédito y cuando llega el momento del pago se retrasan, pero aun así continua con su trabajo. Pero su fin es crecer como comerciante y ampliar su bodega hasta convertirla en un tienda donde pueda vender toda clase de productos. Este será el préstamo número 4 con la institución MFP. Por ello espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Además comenta sentirse bien con su banco comunal, pues conoce a la mayoría, aun existe el ingreso de algunos nuevos, espera que sean responsables como el resto del grupo. Con el monto solicitado de 1500 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la compra de productos al por mayor para su bodega, como azúcar, arroz, aceites y otros.
texts.en:
Luz, 24, is a happy and hard-working woman, besides having a very kind and jovial manner.  She lives with Elías, who is a cook.  They live together next to her sister and her two-year-old son, in her own home.  

The business Luz has is selling general groceries, so she opened a grocery store in her own house.  She learned the business from her father, who had his grocery store in his house, and with financial help from MFP.  She began her business buying small quantities of products, in this way managing to grow during these four years she has been operating, which up to the present she does alone.

She likes her business because it allows her to be at home to be able to take care of her young child, as well as the economic income that serves her to buy what she needs for her home.  Nevertheless, she does not like that some of her customers ask her for credit and then get behind when it comes time to pay.  Even so she continues with her job.  But her goal is to grow as a merchant and expand her grocery store until she converts it into a store where she can sell all types of products.

This will be her fourth loan with the MFP institution, and she hopes for your collaboration so she can realize her plans.  She also comments that she feels good about her communal bank because she knows the majority of the members, although there are still some new ones joining.  She hopes they are responsible like the rest of the group.

With the requested loan of 1500 PEN she will invest in buying wholesale products for her store, such as sugar, rice, oil, and others.

loans.use: to buy household necessities to stock her store.

loans.name: Margot

texts.es:
Margot nació en la provincia de Urubamba pero vive en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja. Este pueblo se localiza en el distrito de Urubamba, provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco, Perú. 

Margot tiene 30 años edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo, ella tiene diferentes tipos de actividades como son por ejemplo elaboración y distribución de artesanía, crianza de animales menores como cuyes, ella tiene un pequeño taller de elaboración de tejidos en su domicilio y donde tiene sus herramientas de trabajo,  ella en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar un telar que cuesta aproximadamente S/. 500.00 nuevos soles. Su sueño de la socia Margot es comprar una casa en la ciudad del Cusco. 

Margot es integrante del grupo “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja” lo conforman 19 socios que viven en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja y donde realizan sus actividades económicas.
texts.en:
Margot was born in Urubamba Province but lives in the village of Rumichaca Baja. This town is located in the District and Province of Urubamba, Department of Cusco, in Peru.

She is 30 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has one child. Margot engages in different types of business activities, such as making and distributing handicrafts and raising small animals such as guinea pigs. She has a small weaving workshop in her home where she keeps the equipment for her work. Margot is taking this opportunity to request a loan to buy a loom that costs approximately 500 PEN. Her dream is to buy a house in the city of Cusco.

Margot is a member of the group “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja” which consists of 19 members who live in the town of Rumichaca Baja where they engage in their business activities.

loans.use: to buy a loom.

loans.name: Nail

texts.en:
Nail is a 39-year-old man who lives with his wife and two children. He is a cattle breeder and has four years of experience in this field.  Nail chose this particular activity because meat is in very high demand in Azerbaijan and most of the national dishes like dolma and pilau are made of meat. 

Nail usually buys small calves in the central bazaar, fattens and raises them for 5-6 months. Then, he resells the grown cattle for a more profitable price to market vendors and butchers. His wife helps to look after the animals and feed them.  

Demand for fresh meat is very high and Nail would like to cover the demands of his permanent clients. For this purpose, he applied for 550 AZN. He will use the loan to buy two baby calves.

loans.use: to purchase two baby calves

loans.name: Sovkat

texts.en:
Sovkat is 51 years old and married with three children. She is a schoolteacher. Her monthly salary is 130 AZN, which is not enough to cover even the basic demands of her three children. To improve her situation, she started her primarily farming business seven years ago. Now this is the main source of income for her family.

Raising and selling fresh fruits and vegetables brings stable income and is in high demand among Azerbaijani people. Fresh vegetables are good for national dishes like pilau and dolma. Fresh fruits are favorites for punch. Sovkat usually sells her crops in the central bazaar and her profit per month is 250 AZN. 

Sovkat decided to expand her business. For this reason, she applied for a loan of 1,000 AZN. She will buy seeds and fertilizers to increase the number of crops and cover her customers' demands.

loans.use: buy seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Anita

texts.es: Anita, de 47 años es una mujer sencilla. Vive en compañía de Marcelino, su esposo desde hace 30 años. Ambos tienen 6 hijos; de los cuales 2 viven con ellos en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Atocc. Desde primeras horas del día, cuida de sus animales entre cuyes, vacas y burros; que según cuenta se encuentran preñadas y le brindan buena leche. Ya por la tarde lleva los alimentos de su esposo, quien cuida de sus sembríos de papa, olluco, habas, cebada y verduras en general. Desde su llegada hasta el último rayo de sol, junto a su esposo, extraen la maleza de entre sus cultivos. Además cada cosecha comercializa sus alimentos a la ciudad de Pampas, en la feria que se realiza los días domingos. Ahora está talentosa mujer, desea incrementar el número de cuyes, ya que tiene buena demanda. Ella pertenece al banco comunal sol naciente y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde se siente desarrollada; pues sus miembros son personas solidarias y muy trabajadoras. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Anita de recibir el préstamo; invertirá el dinero en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para sus sembríos de papa blanca, huari, peruanita y olluco en 3 hectáreas de terreno agrícola.
texts.en:
Anita is 47 years of age and a humble woman. She lives with Marcelino, her husband of 30 years. They have six children, two of whom live with them in their own home in the town of Atocc. From the first few hours of the day, Anita takes care of her animals including guinea pigs, cows, and donkeys. Based on their reproductive cycles, her animals can produce a large quantity of milk. In the afternoons, she delivers food to her husband who looks after their crops of potatoes, ulluco, beans, barley, and vegetables. From the time she arrives until the last ray of sunlight is visible, Anita and her husband remove weeds from their crops. In addition, they sell their crops in the city of Pampas where the fair is held every Sunday. Anita is a talented woman. She wants to increase her number of guinea pigs since these animals are in high demand.

Anita is a member of the Communal Bank “Sol Naciente” (Rising Sun) and this is her first loan with MFP. She feels she has developed along with the other members who are united and responsible people. In addition, she promises to be punctual with her loan payments. Upon receiving her loan, Anita will invest the money in the purchase of natural fertilizers for her crops of white, “huari”, and Peruvian potatoes, as well as “ulluco”. She has three hectares of farmland.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase new tools for work

loans.name: Kpindi

texts.fr:
Kpindi est une femme âgée de 51 ans. Elle est mariée å un retraité. Elle a 2 enfants qui vont à l’école. Le premier a 15 ans et le dernier a 13 ans.
Kpindi travaille comme revendeuse depuis 2004. Elle vend des pagnes pour tous clients à domicile. Elle achète les produits à Lomé. Elle travaille seule. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est la concurrence.
Kpindi a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des pagnes. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Kpindi voudrait agrandir la taille de son activité. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, elle prévoit de prendre soin de sa famille.
texts.en: Kpindi is a 51-year-old woman.  Her husband is retired.  She has two children, ages 15 and 13, who attend school.  Kpindi has been working as a reseller since 2004.  She sells pagnes (colorful West-African fabric) from her home, to all types of customers.  She buys her merchandise in Lomé and works alone.  Currently, her main difficulty is competition.  Kpindi has requested her first loan from WAGES in order to buy some pagnes.  She wants to reinvest in her business.  In the coming years, Kpindi would like to increase the size of her business.  She says that with the profits, she plans to take care of her family.

loans.use: To buy pagnes (colorful West-African fabric)

loans.name: Arame Thiaw

texts.fr: Madame Arame vit au Sénégal depuis sa naissance. Elle est âgée  de 55 ans. Elle est veuve et exerce l’activité de femme de ménage depuis 20 ans.  Les raisons du choix de son  activité  est sa volonté de subvenir aux besoins de sa petite famille. Elle est sociétaire dans un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC  de la localité ou elle habite  depuis novembre 2003. Elle a déjà remboursé  9 prêts  antérieurs. Elle sollicite un crédit de 500 000 frs prévu  pour la finition de la construction d’un appartement qu’elle avait entamé  chez elle.  Ses crédits antérieurs lui ont permis d’aménager sa maison  et de faire face aux dépenses de carrelage, de  dallage, d’électricité, de plomberie et  d’achats de portes et fenêtres. Son objectif est  d’améliorer  le confort et le cadre de vie de sa progéniture.
texts.en: Mrs. Arame has lived in Senegal since birth.  She is 55 years old. She is a widow and has been a cleaning lady for 20 years.  She chose her profession in order to provide for her small family.  She is a member of UIMCEC in the town where she has lived since November 2003.  She has already repaid 9 prior loans. She is asking for a loan of 500,000 francs to finish construction of an apartment that she had made her own.  Her prior loans have allowed her to move into her home and to cover the expenses of tile, flooring, electrical, plumbing, and the purchase of windows and doors.  Her goal is to improve the comfort and the quality of life of her children.

loans.use: to finish her apartment.

loans.name: Josefina

texts.es:
Josefina nació en la provincia de Urubamba pero vive en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja. Este pueblo se localiza en el distrito de Urubamba, provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco, Perú. 

Josefina tiene 36 años edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos, ella tiene diferentes tipos de actividades como son por ejemplo trabaja en un restaurante turístico, agricultura y crianza de animales menores, ella comprar el par cuyes a S/. 15.00 nuevos soles y durante 100 días tiene que alcanzar un kilo de peso para después venderlo cada cuy a S/25.00 nuevos soles. Josefina en esta oportundiad requiere el prestamo para comprar mas cuyes. Su sueño de la socia Josefina es comprar un carro.  

Josefina es integrante del grupo “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja” lo conforman 19 socios que viven en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja y donde realizan sus actividades económicas.
texts.en:
Josefina was born in Urubamba Province but lives in the town of Rumichaca Baja. This town is located in the District and Province of Urubamba, Department of Cusco, in Peru.

Josefina is 36 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has two children. She engages in different types of business activities such as working at a tourist restaurant, farming, and raising small animals. Josefina will buy guinea pigs for 15 PEN/pair and then raise them for the next 100 days until they reach one kilo in weight. Afterwards, she will sell each guinea pig for 25 PEN. Josefina is taking this opportunity to request a loan to buy more guinea pigs. Her dream is to buy a car.

Josefina is a member of the group “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja” which consists of 19 members who live in the town of Rumichaca Baja where they engage in their business activities.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs.

loans.name: Josefina

texts.es: Josefina, de 47 años es una mujer singular. Vive en compañía de su esposo Daniel, con quien tiene 25 años de casados. Ambos tienen 5 hijos, pero solo 3 viven con ellos en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Atocc.  Hace 26 años, conformó su familia. Desde entonces tuvo que afrontar muchas adversidades, entre ella comprar su propia casa. Por ello comenzó a sembrar en terrenos propios papa, olluco y habas. Cuenta que en cada cosecha, obtiene buenos ingresos; pues los comercializa en la capital del país, Pampas o Huancayo; todo depende del precio que le ofrece manifiesta Josefina. Asimismo tiene vacas, ovejas y demás ganados que le proporciona leche; con la que se alimenta y vende depende de la cantidad de litros que saca de su ganado. Ahora desea aumentar sus animales y mejorar sus cultivos para tener buenas ganancias. Ella pertenece al banco comunal, sol naciente, y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde se siente desarrollada; pues sus miembros son personas solidarias y muy trabajadoras. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Josefina, de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para sus cultivos de papa.
texts.en:
Josefina is 47, and an exceptional woman. She lives with her husband Daniel, and they have been married for 25 years. They have five children, but only three live with them in their own house, located in the village of Atocc. 

She started her family 26 years ago, and since then, has had to face a lot of challenges, including buying her own house. That's why she began to grow potatoes, olluco (a root vegetable), and lima beans on her own land. 

She says that she gets a good return at every harvest, as she sells her crops in the country's capital, Lima, in Pampas or in Huancayo. It all depends on the price she is offered, says Josefina.  As well, she has cows, sheep and other livestock that provide her with milk, which she uses to feed herself, or sells, depending on the quantity of liters that she gets from her livestock. 

Now she wishes to increase the number of animals she has, and improve her crops, in order to have good earnings. She belongs to the "Sol Naciente" communal bank, and this is her second loan with MFP. She feels fulfilled with the group, as its members are supportive and very hard-working.

In addition, she promises to pay her instalments on time. When she gets the loan, Josefina will use the money applied for to buy natural fertilizers for her potato crop.

loans.use: To buy sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Alejandra

texts.es: Alejandra, de 43 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de su esposo Pablo al que quiere mucho, llevan juntos 25 años. Ambos tienen 8 hijos, pero solo viven con 4 de ellos en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Atocc. Su visión en estos momentos se centra en la venta de granos verdes, papa y demás productos de primera necesidad a las diferentes ferias de la ciudad de Huancayo, Pampas y la capital del país, Lima. Mientras eso sucede, ella continua trabajando en sus sembríos de papa, olluco, habas, que comercializa a la ciudad de Lima, donde viaja constantemente. Además cuida de sus vacas de buena calidad que le brinda rica leche. De ahí obtiene una ganancia extra, de igual manera, tiene ovejas que engorda para venderlas a un mayor precio, entre los carniceros. Ahora ella desea juntar más dinero, para comenzar con su negocio, es optimista y sabe que con la ayuda de su asociación lo logrará. Ella pertenece al banco comunal, sol naciente, y este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, donde se siente desarrollada; pues sus miembros son personas solidarias y muy trabajadoras. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Alejandra, de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para nutrir sus sembríos de papa y olluco.
texts.en:
Alejandra is 43, and a hard-working woman. She lives with her husband Pablo, whom she loves very much. They have been together for 25 years. They have eight children, but only live with four of them in their own house, located in the settlement of Atocc. 

Currently, her main focus is on the sale of unroasted coffee beans, potatoes, and other basic staples at the various markets in the city of Huancayo, Pampas, and the country's capital, Lima. Meanwhile, she continues working on her potato, olluco (a root vegetable), and lima bean crops, that she sells in the city of Lima, where she travels constantly. 

In addition, she looks after her cows, who are of good quality, and provide her with rich milk. From this she gets extra earnings. In the same way, she has sheep that she fattens, to sell at a higher price to the butcher shops. 

Now she want to raise more money, to get her business going. She is optimistic, and knows that with her group's help she will succeed. She belongs to the "Sol Naciente" communal bank, and this is the fourth loan with MFP.  She feels she is developing as a person, as its members are supportive and very hard-working people. In addition, she promises to pay her instalments on time. 

On receiving the loan, Alejandra will use the money applied for, to buy natural fertilizers to nourish her potato and olluco crops.

loans.use: To buy natural fertilizers.

loans.name: Siempre Unidos Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SIEMPRE UNIDOS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Ericka; ella es conviviente y tiene 30 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja con su negocio de venta de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azúcar,leche,aceite y fideos, ella trabaja desde las 5:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m, por medio de este pequeño negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es ampliar la tienda de abarrotes y de esta manera poder aumentar su mercadería. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para implementar la tienda de abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, leche, aceite, fideos y galletas al por mayor.
 Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de venta de verduras, negocio de transporte, negocio de restaurant, negocio de servicio de taxi, negocio de venta de colchas.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The people in the photo are members of the “Siempre Unidos” Communal Bank. This bank is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to Cusco Province in Cusco Department.

Sra. Ericka is featured here. She has lived with her partner for 30 years and has three children. She has a business selling groceries, essentially basic supplies such as rice, sugar, milk, oil and noodles. She works from 5 a.m. until 10 p.m. Through this small business, Ericka has helped her children get ahead. Her dream is to expand her grocery store so that she can increase her merchandise.

Ericka is requesting a loan to purchase products wholesale in order to stock her grocery store. She will buy items such as rice, sugar, milk, oil, noodles and cookies. The other members of the bank have businesses selling vegetable, in transportation, a restaurant, a taxi service, and a business selling mattresses.

Ericka is grateful to those who are enabling her to realize her dream in this manner and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy products wholesale to stock her grocery store such as rice, sugar, milk, oil, noodles and cookies

loans.name: Jorge Ramiro

texts.es:
Jorge es una persona que le gusta trabajar y hacer bien las cosas. Jorge vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos en Pimampiro que se encuentra a media hora de Ibarra en la Provincia de Imbabura. Jorge trabaja 28 años en su pequeño taller de carpintería.

Es el primer crédito que realiza a Fodemi, el mismo que va a ser invertido en la compra de nueva maquinaria y madera para contruir muebles ya que por la temporada ha tenido varios pedidos y necesita aumentar su producción para poder obtener buenos ingresos económicos y poderles dar el estudio a sus dos hijos y cubrir las necesidades de su casa.

El sueño de Jorge es poder terminar de contruir su casa e incrementar nueva tecnología en su taller.
texts.en:
Jorge is a person who enjoys working and doing things well. He lives with his wife and two children in Pimampiro which is located half an hour from Ibarra in Imbabura Province. Jorge has been working for 28 years in his small carpentry shop.

This is his first loan from Fodemi, which he is going to invest in purchasing new machinery and wood in order to build furniture. Due to the holiday season, he has had several orders and he needs to increase his production in order to earn a good income so that he can provide an education for his children and cover household necessities.

Jorge’s dream is to be able to finish building his house and to increase the new technology in his shop.

loans.use: to buy new machinery and wood in order to increase production and his sales in this Christmas season.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es: Teresa, de 37 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de Alejandro su esposo desde hace 18 años. Ambos tienen 5 hijos a los que cuidan en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Atocc. En la zona alta de la ciudad de Pampas, se ubica la casa de Teresa. Donde todas las mañanas sale a cuidar de sus sembríos de papa, habas, alverja y demás productos oriundos de la zona. Además junto a su esposo cuidan de sus animales como cuyes, gallinas y cerdos. Los que vende cada vez que necesita dinero. Pues muchas veces le amparó de imprevistos que se presentaron en diversas ocasiones. Ahora desea mejorar su calidad de vida, mejorando su pequeña y cogedora vivienda. Sabe que lo logrará, pues en cada cosecha comercializa sus sembríos a la ciudad de Pampas, donde tiene buenos clientes, que le pagan mucho dinero por costal.
