Ella pertenece al banco comunal, sol naciente y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde se siente desarrollada; pues sus miembros son personas solidarias y muy trabajadoras. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Teresa de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para sus cultivos de papa.
texts.en:
Teresa, 37, is a hardworking woman. She lives with Alejandro, her husband of 18 years. They have 5 children they are raising in their own home, located in the neighborhood of Atocc, in the upper area of the city of Pampas.

Every morning Teresa leaves to tend to her fields of potatoes, fava beans, green peas and other products native to the area. In addition, she and her husband also care for their animals such as guinea pigs, chickens and pigs, which they sell whenever they need money, for often on different occasions they provide a source of support when the unexpected happens.

Now, Teresa wants to improve her quality of life by improving her small and welcoming home. She knows that she will succeed in doing so, since for each harvest of crops she sells in Pampas, where she has good customers, they pay her good money per bag. 

She belongs to the Sol Naciente Communal Bank and this is her first loan with MFP. She feels empowered in the bank, since the members are very hard working and supportive. In addition, she promises to make her payments punctually. Upon receiving your support, Teresa will invest the money in the purchase of natural fertilizers for her potato crops.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Guillermo

texts.es: El socio continua prestando servicio de tranporte en el rubro de turismo; pero adicionalmente a este trabjao el socio apoya a su conyugue con el negocio de ella de comprar y vender pollos y gallinas. el socio en esta ocasión desea invertir el prestamo en la compra de pollos y de gallinas al por mayor para que su esposa las venda a sus clientas, el socio también invertira parte del credito en el mantenimiento de su unidad vehicular. El socio desea a futuro cercano que el negocio de sus esposa crezca para que tengan mayores ganacias.
texts.en: The member continues offering transportation service in the area of tourism.  In addition to this work he helps his spouse with her business buying and selling chickens and hens.  Now he wants to invest the loan in buying chickens and hens wholesale for his wife to sell to her customers.  He also wants to invest part of the loan to maintain his vehicle.  He hopes that in the near future his wife's business will grow so they have more profit.

loans.use: to maintain his vehicle with part of the loan.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase three cattle, one milking cow and fodder

loans.name: Edison

texts.es:
El Sr. Edison es de la ciudad de Itá, tiene 25 años de edad, vive en casa de sus padres. Él se dedica a la venta de joyas y ropas por la ciudad de Itá, se dedica a esto desde el año 2005, cuenta que el negocio le va muy bien por la clientela ya formada y eso agradece a la fundación por los créditos otorgados para su capital de trabajo.
El se define como una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora que se esfuerza al máximo para poder seguir creciendo tanto en lo económico como en lo personal. Comenta que su objetivo es ir creciendo como comerciante para así lograr todas sus metas propuestas.
Edison solicita para la compra de cadenas, pulseras, anillos y demás tipos de joyas, ya que en estas épocas tiene la mayor demanda de la misma.
texts.en:
Mr. Edison is from the city of Itá, he is 25 years old, and he lives with his parents.  He works selling jewelry and clothes in the city of Itá.  He has been dedicated to this work since 2005.  He says that the business is going well because the clientele is established and that is thanks to the Kiva-partner foundation and its loans given to provide capital for his work.

He defines himself as a very hard-working person who fights and makes the maximum effort to be able to continue growing in both economic and personal ways.  He comments that his goal is to grow as a businessman in order to achieve his proposed goals.

Edison is asking for a loan in order to purchase chains, bracelets, rings and other types of jewelry, since at this time of year he sees the greatest demand for those products.

loans.use: to purchase chains, bracelets, rings and other types of jewelry

loans.name: Aizétou

texts.fr:
Aizétou est une femme  âgé(e) de 43 ans. Elle est mariée å un  chauffeur. Elle a 05 enfants tous scolarisés. L’ainé a 20ans et le dernier 10ans.
Aizétou travaille comme revendeuse de céréales depuis 1998. Elle vend au marché et n’a pas de difficultés principale.
Aizétou a requis son second  crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des céréales. Elle veut diversifier ses marchandises.
Dans les prochaines années, Aizétou voudrait agrandir l’activité.  Elle dit qu’avec les profits, Elle prévoit assurer les besoins vitaux de la famille.
texts.en:
Aizétou is a forty-three year old woman. She is married to a driver. She has five children, all in school. The oldest is twenty years old and the youngest is ten. Aizétou has worked as a reseller of grains since 1998. She sells at the market and doesn't have any major difficulties. 
Aizétou has requested her second loan from WAGES in order to buy grains. She would like to diversify her merchandise.
In the coming years, Aizétou would like to increase her business activity. She says that with the profits, she foresees ensuring the vital needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy grains.

loans.name: Sofia

texts.es:
Sofía nació en la provincia de Urubamba pero vive en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja. Este pueblo se localiza en el distrito de Urubamba, provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco, Perú. 

Sofía tiene 25 años edad y es madre y padre para su único hijo, ella hace un año vivía en la ciudad de Lima y trabajaba como moza en un club de rencuentro pero le fue muy mal y tuvo regresar a la ciudad de Urubamba. Actualmente, ella trabaja como administradora de un condominio en la ciudad de Rumichaca Baja, ella también trabaja en el uno de los hoteles más lujosos de la ciudad del Cusco como bartender. Ya son cuatro meses que trabaja en el hotel y le va muy bien. Sofía en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para preparar chocolate y para comprar regalos para repartir el día 23 de diciembre en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja a los niños pobres por motivo de la natividad.  Su sueño de Sofía es abrir una discoteca y abrir una empresa de transporte urbano.  

Sofía es integrante del grupo “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja” lo conforman 19 socios que viven en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja y donde realizan sus actividades económicas.
texts.en:
Sofia was born in the province of Urubamba, but she lives in the town of Rumichaca Baja.  This town is located in the district of Urubamba, the province of Urubamba and the department of Cusco, Perú. 

Sofia is 25 years old and is a mother and father to her only child.  One year ago she lived in the city of Lima and worked as a waitress in a nightclub but it did not go well and she had to return to the city of Urubamba.  Currently she works as as administrator of a condominium in the city of Rumichaca Baja.  She also works in one of the most luxurious hotels in the city of Cusco as a bartender.  She has been working in the hotel for four months and it is going well.  Sofia is asking for the current loan in order to prepare chocolate and to buy gifts to give out on Dec. 23rd in the town of Rumichaca Baja to the poor children in celebration of the nativity.  Sofia's dream is to open a Dance Club and open a business for urban transit.  

Sofia is a member of the group "Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja" or "The Sunflowers of Rumichaca Baja" which is made up of 19 members who live in the town of Rumichaca Baja where they work on their economic activities.

loans.use: To prepare chocolate and to buy presents

loans.name: Hasiya

texts.en:
Hasiya is 55 years old and married with three children. She is an IDP (internally displaced person) and lives in Bilasuvar IDP Settlement. Hasiya has been breeding sheep and cows for the last three years. When she retired, she was left without daily bread, as her pension is only 60 AZN. She decided to start her business and with the help of her father, who was breeding animals for his entire life, they purchased her first cattle.

Hasiya usually buys lambs, raises and fattens them for 3-5 months and then resells them for amore profitable price in the livestock bazaar. Her monthly income is 250 AZN and this business is the only source of financial income in her family. Mutton is in very high demand in Azerbaijan and people use it in everyday dishes like pilau and dolma. Hasiya also keeps milkier cows for personal use and for selling to neighbors.  

She wants to expand her business and improve life conditions of her family. She applied for a loan of 1,500 AZN to purchase 10 sheep, one milkier cow and fodder. This will be her fourth loan from AqroInvest CU and she has a good client history.

loans.use: to purchase 10 sheep, one milking cow and fodder

loans.name: Moraima

texts.es:
Moraima, de 48 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, además de alegre y amable,  está separada desde hace 11 años, vive en compañía de su hija de 22 años y su nieto de 2 años de edad, instalados cómodamente en su casa propia. El negocio que tiene Moraima es la venta de comida, que lo realiza de lunes a viernes atendiendo muy amablemente a sus clientes logrando tener una buena acogida y demanda. Además los domingos venden parrilladas de pollos, realizando este negocio desde hace 10 años contando con la ayuda de su hija, iniciándose con un capital de un préstamo particular.
Le gusta su negocio pues comenta, le gusta cocinar y esto lo aprendio de su madre, los secretos para una buena sazón, así como el ingreso económico que le permite pagar sus cuentas y gastos de su hogar. Sin embargo no le gusta por el cansancio físico ya que tienen que levantarse muy de temprano por las mañanas para realizar los preparativos del día, pero eso no la desanima y continúa en su negocio. Lo que ahora planea es ampliar su negocio y mejorar su techado donde pueda atender más cómodamente a sus clientes. Este será el préstamo número 10 con la institución MFP. Por ello espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Además dice estar cómoda con su banco comunal ya que considera a sus miembros ser personas responsables. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles lo invertirá en el arreglo de su piso con cemento del mismo modo refaccionar su techo para así atender más cómodamente a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Moraima, 48, is hard-working and earnest, as well as happy and friendly. She has been separated for 11 years and lives comfortably in a house she owns, together with her 22 year-old daughter and 2 year-old grandson. Moraima's business is selling food, which she does from Monday to Friday. The friendly way she treats her customers has earned her a good reception and high demand. On Sundays, she also sells barbecued chicken. With her daughter's help, she has been running this business for ten years. She started it with capital from a private loan.

Moraima is pleased with her business and commented that she enjoys cooking and learned the secrets of good seasoning from her mother. This business is the economic means by which she is able to pay her bills and other household expenses. However, she dislikes the physical fatigue, as she has to get up very early in the morning to prepare for the day. Nevertheless, this does not discourage her and she continues with her business. She is currently planning to expand her business and to improve her roof so that she can more comfortably tend to her customers. This will be her tenth loan through Microfinanzas Prisma. She is hoping for your help so that she can cement her plans. She also says that she is comfortable with her communal bank and considers her fellow members to be responsible people. With the 1,000 nuevos soles that she is requesting, Moraima will invest in repairing her floor and roof with cement so that she can serve her customers more comfortably.

loans.use: to buy cement to repair the floor and roof of her property

loans.name: Mbagnik

texts.fr: Monsieur Mbagnick est un mécanicien de 48 ans qui vit au Sénégal. Il capitalise   une expérience de 30ans. Il a choisi  son activité  par amour sous l’influence de ses parents. Il est membre d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis juin 2005. Il sollicite un crédit de 500 000 frs prévu pour compléter son épargne dans le but d’acquérir un véhicule.  Ce véhicule réfectionné sera destiné à la vente, ce qui    lui permettra d’accroitre ses revenus personnels.
texts.en: Mr. Mbagnick is a 48 year old mechanic who lives in Senegal. He has 30 years of experience. He chose his profession out of love, under the influence of his parents. He has been a member of UIMCEC since June 2005.  He is asking for a loan of 500,000 francs to supplement his savings to acquire a vehicle.  This car will be repaired for resale, which will allow him to increase his personal income.

loans.use: to buy a vehicle.

loans.name: Qorilazo Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “QORILAZO”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Yeni; ella es conviviente y tiene 27 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja con su negocio de venta de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende arroz,azúcar,leche,aceite y golosinas ,la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m, la socia también se dedica a vender choclos cocinados con queso ella vende en forma ambulatoria, por medio de estos pequeños negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los choclos con queso y también ampliar la tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos como arroz, azúcar, leche y aceite al por mayor y también para comprar choclos y queso al por mayor.
 Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de venta de jora, negocio de gallinas, negocio de tienda de abarrotes, negocio de  venta de comida, negocio de venta de cuyes.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the Qorilazo communal bank. This bank is located in the district of Cusco, which is part of the province and department of Cusco.

One of the members is Señora Yeni. She is 27 years old, is in a common-law marriage, and has two children. Her business is a grocery store. She sells rice, sugar, milk, oil and candies. She works from 6:00 am to 10:00 pm. She also sells corn cooked with cheese, which she sells as a street vendor. Through these little businesses she is raising her children. Her dream is to have a shop where she can sell corn with cheese and also to expand her grocery store. She is applying for the loan to buy products such as rice, sugar, milk, and oil wholesale, and also to buy corn and cheese wholesale.

The other members' businesses include selling chicha (a traditional Andean corn-based alcoholic drink), a chicken business, a grocery store, selling food, and selling guinea pigs.

Sra. Yeni is thankful to those who form part of her dream through the loans and she promises to make her payments according to the established schedule.

loans.use: to buy products such as rice, sugar, milk, oil, corn, and cheese wholesale.

loans.name: Anderson

texts.es: El socio Anderson; Continua con su negocio de venta de maquinas industriales para la elaboracion de diferentes productos, el socio vende maquinarias como molineros industriales para granos, el socio en esta ocasión desea invertir el prestamo en el pago inicial de la compra de una maquina para moler granos como trigo, maiz, enttre otros productos que le han hecho pedido.
texts.en: Anderson keeps on running his activity, selling industrial machineries manufacturing different products. He sells machineries such as industrial grain grinders, and in this occasion he wants to invest the loan in the initial payment for the purchase of a machine to grind grains such as wheat and maize, one of the products he has received a request for.

loans.use: To invest it in the initial payment for the purchase of a grinder for wheat and maize.

loans.name: Mahugnon As Group

texts.fr: Le groupement MAHUGNON AS est composé de dix huit personnes qui habitent le même village et mènent toutes des activités génératrices de revenus. C'est la troisième fois que ce groupement sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de leur activité. La représentante de ce groupement, du nom de Annick est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Annick est âgée de 39 ans et est mariée à un cuisinier du nom de François. Le couple a deux enfants, tous scolarisés et à sa charge. Annick n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Pour subvenir à ses besoins, Annick mène comme activité depuis vingt ans la vente des sacs de maïs et des condiments dans un quartier du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaire et son revenu, Annick sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupement MAHUGNON AS, un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les deux premiers prêts ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The MAHUGNON AS group is comprised of eighteen people who live in the same village, all of whom conduct revenue generating activities. This is the third time the group is seeking the financial assistance of ALIDé, in order to increase the scale of their business. The group representative is called Annick and has her hand raised in the photo.
Annick is 39 years old and is married to a cook named François. They have two dependent children, both in school. Annick did not attend school. In order to cover her expenses, Annick has sold bags of corn and condiments in an area of Benin for the last twenty years. WIth the goal of satisfying her customers, and to increase her turnover and her profit, Annick is requesting a third loan from ALIDé, together with the other members of the MAHUGNON AS group. The first two loans have been fully repaid.

loans.use: to buy bags of corn and condiments

loans.name: Bariétou

texts.fr:
Bariétou est une femme  âgé(e) de 34 ans. Elle est mariée à un chauffeur. Elle a 02 enfants tous vont à l’école. L’ainé a 10ans et le 07ans.
Bariétou travaille comme revendeuse de bois de chauffe depuis 2005. Elle vend seule à la maison.
Bariétou a requis son second  crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des bois de chauffe. Elle veut épargner pour démarrer la vente de charbon de bois.. 
Dans les prochaines années, Bariétou voudrait agrandir l’activité. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, Elle prévoit assurer une stabilité financière.
texts.en:
Bariétou is a 34-year-old woman. She is married to a driver. She has two children who both go to school. The eldest is 10 and the youngest 7 years old.

Bariétou has been reselling firewood since 2005. She sells alone from her home.

Bariétou has requested her second loan from WAGES in order to buy firewood. She wants to save in order to start up the sale of charcoal.

In the coming years, Bariétou would like to expand her business. She says that with the profits, she plans to ensure financial stability.

loans.use: to buy firewood.

loans.name: Yoni

texts.es: La socia Yoni continua con su negocio de compra y venta de animales menores como son los pollos y gallinas, la socia en esta ocasión desea el credito para invertir en la compra de 1000 pollos junto al credito de su esposo y 2000 gallinas; la socia  tiene una pequeña granja en casa e invertiran en la compra de pollos y gallinas para aumentar su negocio y crecer economicamente. La socia desea a futuro tener su propio capital y ser una de las proveedoras grandes dentro la ciudad de venta de pollos y gallinas. La socia tiene varios pedidos en esta fecha y desea invertir el prestamo en la compra de 1000 pollos y de 2000 gallinas.
texts.en: Yoni keeps on running her activity, selling small animals such as chickens and hens. In this occasion she is requesting a loan to inverts is in the purchase of 1000 chickens - together with the loan her husband has requested - and 2000 hens. Yoni and her husband run a small farm in their house and both of them will invest in the purchase of chickens and hens to improve their activity and to grow economically. In the future she wants to have her own capital and to be one of the big suppliers of chickens and hens of her town. At the moment Yoni has many requests to satisfy and she wants to invest the loan in the purchase of 1000 chickens and 2000 hens.

loans.use: To buy 1000 chickens and 2000 hens.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy materials for home improvements

loans.name: Yelognisse 1 Group

texts.fr: Le groupe YELOGNISSE 1 est formé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Thérèse, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. C’est la troisième fois que ce groupe sollicite l’appui financier de ALIDé en vue d’élever le niveau de leur activité. Thérèse est âgée de 46 ans et est mariée à un menuisier du nom de Luc. Le couple a cinq enfants, dont certains scolarisés, et tous à leur charge. Thérèse vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants et assure ensemble avec son mari les diverses charges de la maison. Il y a près de dix ans que Thérèse mène comme activité la vente de bouteilles et des bidons dans son quartier. Thérèse s'approvisionne dans un quartier du Bénin. Dans la quête d'une meilleure satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son revenu, Thérèse sollicite pour la troisième fois, un crédit auprès de ALIDé, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe YELOGNISSE 1.
texts.en:
The YELOGNISSE 1 group is formed of three people who live in the same area. The group representative, named Thérèse, has her hand raised in the photo. This is the third time the group is seeking the financial assistance of ALIDé in order to increase the scale of their business. Thérèse is 46 years old and is married to a carpenter named Luc.
They have five dependent children, some of whom are in school. Thérèse lives together with her husband and children, and she and her husband together cover the various household expenses. For almost ten years, Thérèse has conducted the sale of bottles and containers in her neighbourhood. Thérèse buys her stock in an area of Benin. With the goal of better satisfying her customers and growing her income, Thérèse is seeking this third loan from ALIDé, together with the other members of the YELOGNISSE 1 group.

loans.use: to buy bottles and containers

loans.name: Rouwatou

texts.fr:
Rouwatou est une femme  âgé(e) de 40 ans. Elle est mariée å un  électricien bâtiment. Elle a 03 enfants dont un à l'école. L'ainé a 15ans et le dernier 09ans.
Rouwatou travaille comme revendeuse de produits de mercerie depuis 2006. Elle vend  à ses clients dans une boutique. Rouwatou a requis son troisième  crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des produits de mercerie. Elle veut économiser pour vendre des pagnes.
Dans les prochaines années, Rouwatou voudrait agrandir l’activité.  Elle dit qu’avec les profits, Elle prévoit assurer les besoins vitaux de la famille.
texts.en:
Rouwatou is a 40-year-old woman. She is married to a building electrician. She has three children of whom one goes to school. The eldest is 15 and the youngest 9 years old.

Rouwatou has been working as a reseller of notions since 2006. She sells to her clients in a shop. Rouwatou has requested her third loan from WAGES in oder to buy notions. She wants to save in order to sell loincloths.

In the coming years, Rouwatou would like to expand her business. She says that with the profits, she plans to take care of her family's vital needs.

loans.use: to buy notions.

loans.name: Ani Roxana

texts.es:
La señora Ani Roxana, pertenece al Banco Comunal “NUEVA LUZ DEL MAÑANA” de la Asociación Arariwa de la Provincia del Cusco, Departamento del Cusco. Es conviviente, tiene 27 años y tiene una hija de 2 años, la socia trabaj dentro del banco junto a sus padres.

La socia trabaja junto a sus padres tam,bien en lo que respecta a lo laboral, la socia compra, cria y vende gallinas y pollos, la socia junto a su familia estan emprendiendo un negocio familiar en el rubro de la avicultura, ella desea aprender bien el negocio para luego independizarse o hacer crecer mas el negocio familiar. La sociacomprara pollos y gallinas en total 40 jabas en cada jaba de ella hay de 8 a 10 gallinas o pollos segun el tamaño de las aves. La socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de 40 jabas de pollos y gallinas.

 
La socia se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Señora Ani Roxana belongs to the Asociación Arariwa’s “NUEVA LUZ DEL MAÑANA” (New Light of the Morning) Communal Bank in the province of Cusco, department of Cusco. She is married, 27 years old, and has a two year old daughter. The member works in the bank along with her parents.

The member also works with her parents purchasing, raising, and selling chickens and hens. They are beginning a family agricultural business, and she wants to learn it well so that the business grows and they can be independent.

The member wants to purchase 40 crates of chickens and hens. In each crate there are 8 to 10 chickens, depending on the size of the birds. She is applying for the loan in order to invest in the purchase of 40 crates of chickens and hens. She is thankful for the opportunity offered through this loan and, in addition promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase 40 crates of chickens and hens.

loans.name: Aydee

texts.es:
Aydee nació en la provincia de Urubamba pero vive en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja. Este pueblo se localiza en el distrito de Urubamba, provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco, Perú. 

Aydee tiene 32 años edad y es madre y padre para su único hijo, ella trabaja en uno de los restaurantes más lujosos de la ciudad de Urubamba, ella trabaja desde las 6 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde en el restaurante como chef. Ya son cuatro años que trabaja en el restaurante y le va muy bien. Aydee va empezar a dedicarse a la crianza de animales menores como cuyes por ese motivo requiere el préstamo para comprar cuyes. Su sueño de Aydee es comprarse una casa.  

Aydee es integrante del grupo “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja” lo conforman 19 socios que viven en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja y donde realizan sus actividades económicas.
texts.en: Aydee was born in the province of Urubamba but lives in the village of Rumichaca Baja. This village is located in the district of Urubamba, Urubamba province and department of Cusco, Peru.  Aydee is 32 years old and a single mother to her only son.  She works as restaurant chef from 6 am to 6 pm in one of the most luxurious restaurants of the town of Urubamba. It is now four years working in the restaurant and she is doing very well. Aydee is going to start to raise small animals such as guinea pigs which is her motive for requesting the loan to buy guinea pigs. Her dream is to buy herself a house. Aydee is a member of the group "The Baja Rumichaca Sunflowers" is made up of 19 members living in the town of Rumichaca Baja and where they conduct their economic activities.

loans.use: to purchase guinea pigs.

loans.name: Marina Carlota

texts.es:
Marina es una mujer responsable en su trabajo ya que tiene que mantener a su hija que es madre soltera. Marina vive con su esposo, su hija y nieto en Pimampiro que se encuentra ubicado a media hora de Ibarra en la Provincia de Imbabura.

Marina trabaja en una papelería negocio que es de mucha ayuda para su familia ya que tiene que mantener a su hija y a su nieto. Es la primera vez que trabaja con Fodemi, el crédito utilizará en la compra de mercadería como carpetas, hojas de papel ministro, cuadernos, esféros ya que por falta de capital su negocio ha ido decayendo y sus ingresos han bajado. Con esta inversión Marina podrá dar lo necesario en su casa y podrá seguir manteniendo a su hija y a su nieto.

El sueño de Marina es poder comprar los derechos del local a sus hermanos ya que es herencia de su padre.

En la fotografía Marina es la señora que está sin sombrero.
texts.en: Marina is a woman responsible in her work as she has to keep her daughter who is a single mother. Marina lives with her husband, daughter and grandson in Pimampiro which is located half an hour from Ibarra in Imbabura Province. Marina works in a stationery business that is very helpful for her family as she has to support her daughter and grandson. This is the first time working with FODEMI, the loan will be used to purchase merchandise such as folders, paper minister, notebooks, pens as she lacks the capital and business has declined and revenues have fallen. With this investment, Marina will be able give what is necessary at home and will continue to support her daughter and grandson. Marina's dream is to buy local rights of her brothers as that is the legacy of her father. In the picture, Mrs. Marina is without a hat.

loans.use: to supply her business with merchandise such as folders, paper minister, notebooks, pens as she lacks the capital and business has been declining.

loans.name: Edwin Ferney

texts.es: El señor Edwin tiene una tienda desde hace tres años donde vende productos de la canasta familiar, snacks y cerveza, con la cual ha podido sacar adelante a su familia y le brinda el sustento para su hogar. La jornada de trabajo del señor Edwin es de todos los días desde las 7:00 a.m. hasta las 10:00 p.m. Debido a dificultades económicas no ha podido surtir su negocio y lo cual le ha generado perdida de clientes, por lo cual el señor Edwin necesita de capital para surtir de nuevo su negocio con productos de la canasta familiar y cerveza que pueda ofrecer a sus clientes y así recuperar la rentabilidad de su negocio, seguir apoyando a su familia, cumplir su sueño de entrar a estudiar a la universidad y aplicar sus conocimientos en la tienda.
texts.en: Edwin has been running a general store for three years, and he sells basic products, snacks and beer. Thanks to this activity he has been able to provide for and support his family. Edwin works every day form 7 am to 10 pm. Owing to economic problems he has not succeeded in stocking up his store, consequently losing some customers. For this reason Edwin needs working capital to stock up his store once again with basic products and beer to sell to his customers, thus consequently restoring the profitability of his shop, keeping on supporting his family and fulfilling his dream of attending university and employing his knowledge in his activity.

loans.use: To buy basic products and beer to stock up his store.

loans.name: Joshua's Group

texts.en: Alex is 31 years old. He is single and lives in a container with two children. He has been selling spare car parts for the past five years. He wants to use the loan to buy more spare parts to increase his inventory and believes this to be a major opportunity to expand his business. He hopes to improve sales to enable him save more for his children’s education. Alex belongs to the community group called “together we can”. In this group, members act as each other's guarantors and as social collateral to the loan, supporting one another to repay the loan.

loans.use: to purchase more spare car parts for his business

loans.name: Raki

texts.fr: Madame Raki  vit au Sénégal et est âgée  de 61 ans. Elle est veuve et s’active dans le commerce de thioubs, friperie  et encens. Elle a une expérience de plus de 20 ans dans son activité. Elle est membre d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC de la localité ou elle habite depuis février 2004. Elle sollicite un crédit de 200 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de produits qu’elle commercialise. Elle envisage de redémarrer  son activité  qui avait connu un arrêt  suite à la maladie de son mari qui est finalement décédé. Son objectif est de développer son commerce pour acquérir des revenus qui l’aideront  a obtenir un épanouissement sur le plan social, matériel et financier.
texts.en: Raki lives in Senegal and is 61 years old. She is a widow and has an activity trading in "thioubs" (pieces of specially tinted fabric), second-hand clothing  and incense. She has more than 20 years experience in her business. She is a member of a U-IMCEC branch in the town where she has lived since February 2004. She is requesting a loan of 200,000 francs, which will be used to buy the products that she sells. She is planning to restart her business which came to a halt as a result of her husband being ill and finally dying. Her aim is to develop her busness in order to acquire sufficient income to bring her personal fulfilment not only socially but also materially and financially.

loans.use: to buy "thioubs", second-hand clothing and incense for resale

loans.name: Miwawiwe Group

texts.fr: Le groupe MIWAWIWE est formé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Lokossi Tangni, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. C’est la septième fois que ce groupe sollicite l’appui financier d’ALIDé en vue d’élever le niveau de son activité. Lokossi Tangni est âgée de 55 ans et est mariée à un dépanneur du nom de Antoine. Le couple a trois enfants tous scolarisés dont un reste à leur charge. Lokossi Tangni vit ensemble avec son mari et son enfant à charge et assure ensemble avec son mari les diverses charges de la famille. Lokossi Tangni n’a pas fréquenté l'école. Il y a quinze ans que Lokossi Tangni prépare de la nourriture (pâte de maïs accompagnée de sauce, etc.) qu'elle vend dans un marché du Bénin. Parallèlement à cette activité, Lokossi Tangni vend du maïs et de la boisson locale. Lokossi Tangni s'approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d'affaire et son revenu, Lokossi Tangni sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe MIWAWIWE, un septième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les crédits reçus antérieurement ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The Miwawiwe group consists of three people who live in the same neighborhood. The representative of this group, named Lokossi Tangni, is the one whose hand is raised in the photo. This is the seventh time that this group is requesting financial support from ALIDé in order to raise the level of their business. 

Lokossi Tangni is 55 years old and is married to a repairman named Antoine. The couple has three children all in school of whom one is still their dependent. Lokossi Tangni lives together with her husband and her dependent child and takes care of the diverse family responsibilities together with her husband. Lokossi Tangni did not go to school. 

For fifteen years Lokossi Tangni has been preparing food (corn dough accompanied by sauce, etc.) which she sells in a market of Bénin. At the same time as this business, Lokossi Tangni sells corn and local drink. Lokossi Tangni gets her supplies in a market of Bénin. 

In seeking to satisfy her clientèle and to grow her business numbers and her income, Lokossi Tangni is requesting together with the other members of the Miwawiwe group, a seventh loan from ALIDé. The previously received loans were well repaid.

loans.use: to buy bags of corn and condiments.

loans.name: Essi

texts.fr:
Essi est une femme  âgé(e) de 27 ans. Elle est mariée à un revendeur et a un enfant de 03ans qui n’est scolarisé.
Essi travaille comme revendeuse de produits cosmétiques depuis 2010.  Elle vend seule dans un quartier de la placze à ses clients et achète à Lomé. Sa difficulté principale est la péremption des produits en cas de mévente. 
Essi a requis son premier  crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des produits cosmétiques. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Essi voudrait rendre l’activité durable. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, Elle prévoit avoir une famille heureuse.
texts.en:
Essi is a 27-year-old woman. She is married to a reseller and has a 3-year-old child who doesn't go to school.

Essi has been working as a reseller of cosmetics since 2010. She sells alone in an area of the square to her clients and buys in Lomé.

Her main difficulty is the expiry of products in the case that there is a slump in sales.

Essi has requested her first loan from WAGES in order to buy cosmetics. She wants to reinvest in her business.

In the coming years, Essi would like to make her business sustainable. She says that with the profits, she plans to have a happy family.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Atilana

texts.es:
La Sra. Atilana es de la ciudad de Itá, tiene 67 años de edad, está comprometida con el Sr. Mauro, se dedican al comercio teniendo una despensa en su domicilio, además de eso también se dedica a la compra y venta de carbón. Comenta que su esposo es quien la ayuda en el negocio y es por ello que están saliendo adelante.
Ella se define como una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora, ellos se esfuerzan a diario para poder tener una vejez digna. El deseo de ella es poder seguir creciendo y de esa forma tener un poco más de ingresos.
Atilana solicita el crédito para la compra de comestibles, bebidas, panificados, lácteos, enlatados y demás productos de primera necesidad. Ella agradece por la oportunidad de progreso que esta recibiendo.
texts.en:
Atilana comes from the town of Itá, she is 67 years old, she is in a relationship with Mauro and they engage in retailing by running a small store in their house. On top of this she also engages in buying and selling carbon. She says her husband helps her with the shop and it is thanks to his help that they are going ahead.
She considers herself to be a very hardworking and tenacious woman, and she and her husband work very hard on a daily basis to live their old age in a dignified manner. She wishes to keep on growing and to earn a better income.
Atilana is requesting a loan to buy groceries, drinks, backed and dairy products, canned food and other basic necessities. She is thankful for the opportunity to progress she is being given.

loans.use: To buy groceries, drinks, backed and dairy products, canned food and other basic necessities.

loans.name: Fatou

texts.fr: Madame Fatou est mariée et vit au Sénégal. Elle s’active depuis plus de 10 ans dans la coiffure et la vente de téléphones portables et d’habillement. Elle est membre du guichet de l’U-IMCEC de sa zone d’habitation depuis janvier 2011. Elle sollicite un crédit de 200 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de thioups, portables et greffages  qui seront destinés  a la vente. Son  objectif est d’augmenter ses bénéfices  que lui procure son activité.
texts.en: Mrs. Fatou is married and lives in Senegal.  For more than ten years she has been styling hair and selling cell phones and clothing.  She has been an account holder at her local UIMCEC (a credit union) since January 2011.  She is requesting a loan of 200,000 francs to buy cotton cloth, cell phones, and hair weaves to re-sell.  Her goal is to increase her business profits.

loans.use: to buy fabric, cell phones, and hair weaves to re-sell.

loans.name: Fifa Group

texts.fr: Le groupe FIFA est formé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Adriana Adjoua, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. C’est la troisième fois que ce groupe sollicite l’appui financier d’ALIDé en vue d’élever le niveau de leur activité. Adriana Adjoua est mariée à un certain Justin. Le couple a deux enfants, mais aucun enfant n’est plus à leur charge. Adriana Adjoua est âgée de 53 ans. Adriana Adjoua vend depuis cinq ans, des cartes de recharges téléphoniques dans son quartier et divers produits (conserves, pâtes alimentaires, etc.) de façon secondaire ; ce qui lui permet de satisfaire à ses besoins. Dans la quête d'une meilleure satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son revenu, Adriana Adjoua sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe FIFA, un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les deux premiers crédits ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: The FIFA group is made up of three women from the same neighborhood.  The group's representative, named Adriana Adjoua, has her hand raised in the photo.  This is the third time that the group is requesting financial support from ALIDé in order to expand their business.  Adriana Adjoua is married to a man named Justin.  The couple has two children, but both of them are no longer in their care.  She is 53 years old.  For the last five years, Adriana Adjoua has been selling rechargeable phone cards in her neighborhood, along with other products (canned foods, pasta, etc.) on the side; this allows her to meet her needs.  To better satisfy her customers and increase her income, she and the other members of the FIFA group are requesting their third loan through ALIDé.  The first two loans have been fully repaid.

loans.use: to buy rechargeable phone cards, canned foods, and pasta.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
Sonia nació en la provincia de Urubamba pero vive en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja. Este pueblo se localiza en el distrito de Urubamba, provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco, Perú. 

Sonia tiene 29 años edad y es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene tres hijos, ella se dedica a la crianza de animales menores y a la venta de verduras y frutas, ella lleva a vender sus productos a la ciudad del Cusco y tiene un puesto de venta en unos mercados más populares de la misma ciudad. Ya son varios años que trabaja en el negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que el trabajo. En esta oportunidad Sonia requiere el préstamo para comprar más verduras y frutas.  
 
Sonia es integrante del grupo “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja” lo conforman 19 socios que viven en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja y donde realizan sus actividades económicas.
texts.en: Sonia was born in the province of Urubamba but lives in the village of Rumichaca Baja. This village is located in the district of Urubamba, Urubamba province and department of Cusco, Peru. Sonia is 29 years old, married and from this beautiful relationship has three children.  She raises small animals and sells vegetables and fruits in the city of Cusco and has a sales position in one of the popular markets in the same city. It is already several years working in this business and doing very well thanks to the work effort.  In this opportunity Sonia requires the loan to buy more vegetables and fruits.  Sonia is a member of the group "The Baja Rumichaca Sunflowers" which is made up of 19 members living in the town of Rumichaca Baja and where they conduct their economic activities.

loans.use: to purchase more vegetables and fruits.

loans.name: God Bless Group

texts.en:
In the photo are members of the “God Bless” group. They are small scale businesswomen based in Makeni, a city in Northern Sierra Leone. This is the first loan these entrepreneurs are accessing from SMT/Kiva lenders. With this loan, they will be able to expand their businesses, make more profit and consequently improve their standard of living. 

The leader of this group is Isatu. Isatu is 36 years old. She was born in Makeni where she is currently residing together with her husband and five children. Her husband is a military officer and her children are attending primary, secondary and tertiary institutions. For five years now, she has been selling market-food such as palm oil, rice, etc. With the help of this loan, she will buy gallons of palm oil and bags of rice to add to her market's inventory.

loans.use: to buy gallons of palm oil and bags of rice to add to her business

loans.name: Ansou

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un jeune marié sans enfants. Il exerce le métier de coiffure et tient un salon dans son quartier.Il vend aussi des produits cosmétiques et des produits et articles de beauté.Lors des fêtes, le salon lui rapporte des revenus assez importants qui lui permettent prendre en charge ses deux parents et de soutenir ses quatre frères et sœurs. Il supporte également des frais de location et de factures d'eau et d'électricité.Pour renforcer son activité, il sollicite un prêt de 75000f pour acheter du matériel et des produits pour le traitement de cheveux. Son ambition est d'ouvrir d'autres salons de coiffure.
texts.en:
This borrower is a young married man with no children. He is a hairstylist and has a salon in his neighborhood. He also sells cosmetics and beauty products. During festival time, he is able to make a sustainable income and he can take care of both of his parents as well as support his four siblings. He also pays rent, and water and electricity bills. 

To increase his activity, he is asking for a loan of 75,000 francs to buy hair care supplies and products. His ambition is to open more hair salons.

loans.use: to buy hair care supplies and products.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es: Gladys, de 49 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, además de amable y alegre, es separada de su pareja, pero vive en compañía de sus cuatro hijos a los que quiere mucho, instalados cómodamente en su casa propia. El negocio que tiene Gladys es la venta de frutas frescas, negocio que lo realiza desde su propia casa. Para eso se levanta muy de temprano y se dirige al mercado a comprar las frutas recién llegadas y las más frescas. Tiene más de realizando éste negocio y paralelo a ello, también se dedica a la venta de ropa de segundo uso, por lo que tiene un puesto de venta en el mercado Bellavista, negocio que lo realiza desda hace 5 meses. Le gusta ambos negocios ya que le generan los ingresos económicos necesarios para vivir de una manera más cómoda, además de contar con el apoyo económico de sus hijos, ya que con ese dinero lo ahorró y lo utilizó como capital inicial, y viendo que su capital está creciendo, tiene planes de invertirlo en una bodega de venta de abarrotes que lo instalaría en su propia casa. Este será el primer préstamo con la institución MFP, se siente contenta con el apoyo financiero para concretar sus planes. Con el monto solicitado de 800 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la compra de productos de primera necesidad para implementar su bodega y ponerlo en marcha.
texts.en: Gladys, 49 years old, is a hardworking and earnest woman, as well as friendly and cheerful.  She is separated from her partner, but lives with her four children, whom she loves very much, comfortably in their own home. The business has Gladys is selling fresh fruits, which she performs from home. For that she gets up early and heads for the market to buy fresh fruits and the freshest arrivals. She has more than doing this business as she also sells second hand clothing and has a stall in the Bellavista market, a business that she has had for 5 months. She likes both businesses as they generate the income necessary to live a more comfortable life, in addition to financial support from her children, since that money was saved and used as seed money, and seeing that her capital is growing, she plans to invest in a grocery store that she would install at home. This is the first loan with the MFP institution, she feels satisfied with the financial support to realize her plans. With the amount requested of 800 nuevos soles she will invest in buying staples to implement her store and get it going.

loans.use: to buy staples to set up her grocery store.

loans.name: Babacar

texts.fr: Monsieur Babacar  est âgé de 30 ans. Il habite au Sénégal  et évolue dans  le commerce et le vente de tissus, draps et  parfums depuis un an. Il a choisi cette activité dans le but de  se procurer des revenus qui l’aideront à  prendre en charge ses besoins personnels. Ce qui l’intéresse  surtout c’est l’aspect lucratif de son activité. Il est membre de l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis avril 2011. Il sollicite un crédit de 200 000 frs prévu pour  l’achat de tissus, draps et parfums qui seront destinés a la vente. Son objectif est d’améliorer ses gains financiers.
texts.en:
Babacar is 30 years old.  He lives in Sénégal and has been making progress with his business selling cloths, fabrics, and perfumes for one year.  

He chose this activity in order to generate income that would help take care of his personal needs. What interests Babacar the most about his business is its profitable nature. 

Babacar has been a member of one of the UIMCEC branches since April of 2011. He is seeking a loan of 200,000 FRS [XOF] intended for the purchase of fabrics, cloths, and perfumes intended for resale.  His aim is to improve his profits.

loans.use: to purchase fabric, cloth, and perfumes for resale.

loans.name: Nohemi Rosalia

texts.es: La socia es la Sra. Nohemi la socia continua con su negocio de compra y venta de materiales de construcción como cemento, piedras chancadas y piedra mediana, arena y ladrillos, la socia desea invertir en la compra de materiales de construccion y desea seguir creciendo y mejorar sus ganacias.
texts.en: Nohemi keeps on running her activity, buying and selling construction materials such as cement, crushed and mid-sized stones, sand and bricks. She wants to invest the loan in the purchase of construction materials and she wants to keep on growing and increasing her incomes.

loans.use: To buy construction materials such as sand, crushed and mid-sized stones, sand and bricks.

loans.name: Espigas De Oro Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “ESPIGAS DE ORO” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Villa Adela, está compuesta por nueve integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Martha. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de comida, tejido de mantas, venta de electrodomésticos.

La señora Martha,  indica que es la primera vez que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institución por invitación de sus amigas. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de electrodomésticos y para ampliar su mercadería ahora implementará juguetes por ser temporada navideña.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de juguetes) que adquirirá de La Paz y posteriormente lo venderá en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella es soltera y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta que no exista cuota de inicio.
texts.en: The A.C. “ESPIGAS DE ORO” will begin its first season in Pro Mujer, as part of the central focal Villa Adela, and is composed of nine members headed by a board headed by Mrs. Martha. Businesses that members of the community association carry forward are varied among them are: food sales, blanket weaving, selling appliances. Martha indicates that it is the first time working in Pro Mujer and integrates the institution at the invitation of her friends. Today she has a business selling appliances and to expand her merchandise, she will now implement toys for the holiday season. The loan that she will take is to raise capital (purchase of toys) that she will acquire from La Paz and then sell it in retail space. This workflow allows her to generate resources to support her family because she is single and has three children. When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says she likes that there is no startup fee.

loans.use: to purchase toys.

loans.name: Doudedji 1 Group

texts.fr: Le groupe DOUDEDJI 1 est formé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Mariam, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. C’est la troisième fois que ce groupe sollicite l’appui financier de ALIDé en vue d’élever le niveau de leur activité. Mariam est âgée de 35 ans et est mariée à un certain Pascal. Le couple a deux enfants, tous scolarisés, et à leur charge. Mariam vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants et assure ensemble son mari les diverses charges de la maison. Il y a près de huit ans que Mariam mène comme activité la vente de tissus par le système de distribution. Mariam s'approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin et à Lomé. Dans la quête d'une meilleure satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son revenu, Mariam sollicite pour la troisième fois, un crédit auprès de ALIDé, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe DOUDEDJI 1. Les deux premiers crédits ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The DOUDEDJI 1 Group is made up of three people who live in the same neighbourhood.  The representative of the group, Mariam, is the one with the raised hand in the photo. This is the third time that this group has sought financial support from ALIDé with the goal of raising their standard of business.

Mariam is 35 years old and married to a man named Pascal.  The couple has two children, both of whom are in school and their dependents.  Mariam lives together with her husband and children, and along with her husband helps to take care of the various household expenses.

For nearly eight years, Mariam has managed her business selling fabrics through a system of distribution.  Mariam stocks up at markets in Benin and Lomé.

In the interest of better customer satisfaction and increasing her profits, Mariam is requesting a loan for the third time, a loan from ALIDé, together with the other members of the DOUDEDJI 1 Group.  The two pervious loans were properly repaid.

loans.use: to purchase bales of fabric.

loans.name: Yndira

texts.es:
La señora Yndira, pertenece al Banco Comunal “NUEVA LUZ DEL MAÑANA” de la Asociación Arariwa de la Provincia del Cusco, Departamento del Cusco. Es casada, tiene 31 años de edad; y tiene 3 hijos de 14, 10, 2 años de edad. 

La socia se dedica  al elaboracion de chompas, y otros tejidos que ella misma fabrica, la socia suele comprar lanas de colores, cierres, botones, tejedores de todo grozor y teje bellas chompas, chalinas, guantes, gorros de lana, saconcitos , medias entre otros. La socia reparte de forma independiente y en esta ocasion desea invertir el credito en la compra de lanas de colores y grosores, tejedores nuevos, cierres, botones. 
 
La socia se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Señora Yndira belongs to the Asociación Arariwa’s “NUEVA LUZ DEL MAÑANA” (New Light of the Morning) Communal Bank in the province of Cusco, department of Cusco. She is married, 31 years old, and has three children, ages 14, 10, and 2.

The member is engaged in making sweaters and other knitted goods. She plans to purchase dyed wool, zippers, buttons, and thread of all thicknesses. She will knit beautiful sweaters, scarves, gloves, caps, jackets, and stockings, among other things, from wool. She distributes her products independently and, on this occasion, wants to invest the loan in the purchase of dyed, thick wool, new thread, zippers, and buttons. She is thankful for the opportunity offered through this loan and, in addition promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase dyed, thick wool, new thread, zippers, and buttons.

loans.name: Embajadores 1 & 2 Group

texts.en:
Juan is the coordinator of his group Embajadores 1 & 2 ("Ambassadors"). He is excited to be taking out his sixth loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid his previous loan and grown his business. This associate began with Esperanza because it is an interesting program offering more than just loans and low interest. 

Juan plans to use this loan to invest in his business: a fruit stand where he sells all kinds of fruit. He makes his home in a simple structure with his long-term partner and two children. He has had his business for almost four years, starting when he stopped working in private enterprise. He says that his most difficult challenge for now has been to travel to the USA. In the meantime he plans to continue to enjoy his work, being with his family and playing dominoes. He will use his profits to invest in his business and house. His future plan is to have a fruit mall and a vehicle.

His group is located in rural areas surrounding La Romana, where the sugarcane harvest and tourist industry dominate the economy. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable electricity and running water (none of which is potable).

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
La señora Mercedes, pertenece al Banco Comunal “NUEVA LUZ DEL MAÑANA” de la Asociación Arariwa de la Provincia del Cusco, Departamento del Cusco. Es csada, tiene 37 años de edad, y tiene 4 hijos de 17, 14, 12, 5 años de edad. 

La socia se dedica  la atencion de sus pequeño hospedaje y en esta ocasion la socia desea invertir en la compra de accesorios para los acabados del segundo piso o nivel de su hospedaje, la socia fue ahorrando por muchos años y con lo que saca mediante el banco comunal y los ahorros la socia fue invirtiendo en su casa y acomodando la shabiataciones y baños para darlos en hospedaje, ahora ya tiene clientes y a ampliado el segundo piso y mejorado en general la casa, la socia desea invertir en la compra de accesorios para los acabados del segundo nivel, como comprar mayolica, pintura, accesorios para baños, cortinas entre otros.
 
La socia se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Mercedes belongs to the "Nueva Luz del Mañana" communal bank, of the Asociación Arariwa in Cusco province, Cusco department. She is 37, married, and has four children, ages 17, 14, 12, and 5.

The borrower runs a small guest house, on this occasion, wishes to invest in the purchase of fittings, for finishing work on the second floor or level of her guest house. She has been saving for many years, and with what she gets from the communal bank, and her savings, she has been investing in her house, and fixing up the rooms and bathrooms to rent out as lodging. 

Now she already has customers, and has expanded the second floor, and made general improvements to the house. The borrower wishes to invest in the purchase of fittings, needed for finishing work on the second level, such as buying ceramic tiles, paint, bathroom fittings, curtains and other things. 

The borrower is grateful for the opportunity she has been given, and promises to make her instalment payments in accordance with the loan schedule.

loans.use: To buy fittings for the finishing work on the second level of her guest house, such as buying ceramic tile, paint, bathroom fittings, curtains and other things.

loans.name: Olouwatobi Group

texts.fr: Le groupe OLOUWATOBI est formé de trois  personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Adèle Nelly, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. C’est la troisième fois que ce groupe sollicite l’appui financier d’ALIDé en vue d’élever le niveau de leur activité. Adèle Nelly est âgée de 41 ans et est mariée à un certain Paul. Le couple a quatre enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Adèle Nelly a arrêté l’école au niveau secondaire. Il y a sept ans, Adèle Nelly vend de divers tissus par le système de distribution. Ce qui lui permet de subvenir aux besoins de ses enfants. Adèle Nelly achète ses produits au Nigéria et à Lomé.  Dans le but de rehausser le niveau de son activité et de mieux répondre à la demande de sa clientèle, Adèle Nelly désire obtenir un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe OLOUWATOBI.
texts.en:
The OLOUWATOBI Group is made up of three people who live in the same neighbourhood.  The representative of this group, Adèle Nelly, is the one in the photo with the raised hand.  This is the third time that the group is seeking financial assistance from ALIDé hoping to raise their standard of business. 

Adèle Nelly is 41 years old and is married to a man named Paul.  The couple has four children all in school, and their dependents.  Adèle Nelly left school herself at the secondary level. For seven years, Adèle Nelly has sold fabrics through a system of distribution.   This has allowed her to support her children.

Adèle Nelly stocks up in Nigeria and in Lomé.  With the idea of raising the standard of her business and better responding to the needs of her clientele, Adèle Nelly wants to take out a third loan from ALIDé in conjunction with the other members of the OLOUWATOBI Group.

loans.use: to purchase bales of fabric.

loans.name: Maria Salome

texts.es:
La señora Maria Salome, pertenece al Banco Comunal “NUEVA LUZ DEL MAÑANA” de la Asociación Arariwa de la Provincia del Cusco, Departamento del Cusco. Es soltera, tiene 67 años de edad, todos sus hijos son independientes.
La socia tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes, la socia se encarga de administrar y atender su tienda de abarrotes, la socia suele hacer pedidos y en muchos productos cancela a la quincena, en otros es al contado y asi juega con la mercadería para abastecerse. La socia desea aprovechando las fiestas navideñas invertir en la compra de panetones, vinos, champan, galletas, arroz, azucar, fideos, harinas, leche, chocolates entre otros productos. La socia solicita el prestamo para implementar us tienda de abarrotes. 

 
La socia se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Maria Salome belongs to the "Nueva Luz del Mañana" communal bank, of the Asociación Arawiwa in Cusco province, Cusco department. She is 67, and single. All her children are living on their own.

The borrower has a small grocery store. She is responsible for running her grocery store, and serving customers. She usually takes orders, and for many products collects every two weeks. For others, she takes payment in cash. This is how she manages to re-stock merchandise. 

She wishes to take advantage of the Christmas holidays to invest in the purchase of fruitcakes, wines, champagne, cookies, rice, sugar, noodles, flour, milk, chocolates and other products. 

The borrower is applying for the loan in order to run her grocery store.

The borrower is grateful for the opportunity she has been given, and promises to make her instalment payments in accordance with the loan schedule.

loans.use: To run her grocery store.

loans.name: L’Œil De Dieu Group

texts.fr: Le groupe L’ŒIL DE DIEU est formé de trois personnes qui résident dans un même quartier. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Roberte Henriette, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. C’est la quatrième fois que ce groupe sollicite l’appui financier d’ALIDé en vue d’élever le niveau de leur activité. Roberte Henriette est âgée de 53 ans et est une veuve. Roberte Henriette est mère de deux enfants dont un scolarisé et un reste à sa charge. Roberte Henriette a arrêté l’école au niveau secondaire. Il y a douze ans, Roberte Henriette vend des conserves, des liqueurs et des condiments dans son quartier. Roberte Henriette achète ses produits dans un marché du Bénin.  Dans le but d’augmenter le stock de ses produits et de mieux répondre à la demande de sa clientèle, Roberte Henriette désire obtenir un quatrième crédit auprès de ALIDé, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe L’ŒIL DE DIEU. Les trois premiers crédits ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The group, L’oeil de Dieu, is composed of three persons who reside in the same area. The representative of the group, named Roberte Henriette, is the one whose hand is raised in the photo. This is the fourth time that this group is seeking financial support from ALIDé in order to increase the level of their activity. 

Roberte Henriette is 53 years old  and widowed. She is the mother of two children, one of them still in school and her dependent.She left school at secondary level. She has been selling canned goods, alcohol and condiments in her neighborhood for the last twelve years. She buys her products in a market in Benin. 

In order to increase her stock and to better meet her customers demand, Roberte Henriette, together with the other members of L’oeil de Dieu, would like to get a fourth loan from ALIDé. The first three loans have been fully repaid.

loans.use: to purchase boxes of canned goods, alcohol and condiments.

loans.name: Doris' Group

texts.en:
Matilda sells materials and bags in Takoradi. She is 40 years old, married with one child. She has been running this business for four years now but does not have adequate working capital to support her business. She most of the times buys supplies on credit and makes payments after sales.  

She wants to use the loan to purchase additional stock. She hopes to use part of her earnings to finance her children’s education and also build a peaceful family. 

She belongs to the community group called “humanity.” In this group, members assist one another to provide support in handling the repayment.

loans.use: to purchase more stock.

loans.name: Omar

texts.es:
El socio Omar, pertenece al Banco Comunal “NUEVA LUZ DEL MAÑANA” de la Asociación Arariwa de la Provincia del Cusco, Departamento del Cusco. Es conviviente, tiene 36 años de edad y tiene 2 hijos de 7 y 4 años.


El socio  se dedica al comercio minorista en la modalidad de compra y venta de materiales de construcción como son piedra, arena, ladrillos, tejas entre otros, el socio también esta estudiando la carrera profesional de Derecho, el socio trae los materiales del poblado de piñipamapa, de huacarpay y de Abancay. El socio solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra d emateriales de construccion varios como tejas, arena, piedras.
 
El socio se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Omar belongs to the Nueva Luz del Mañana" communal bank, of the Asociación Arariwa in Cusco province, Cusco department. He is 36, lives with his partner, and has two children, ages seven and four.

The borrower works in the retail trade, through the buying and selling of construction materials, such as stone, sand, bricks, tiles and other things. 

The borrower is also studying for a law degree. He brings the materials from the village of Piñipamapa, from Huacarpay, and from Abancay.

He is applying for the loan to invest in the purchase of various construction materials, such as tiles, sand, and stone.
 
The borrower is grateful for the opportunity he has been given, and promises to make his payments in accordance with the loan schedule.

loans.use: To buy construction materials, such as tiles, sand, and stone.

loans.name: Jesugo Group

texts.fr: Le groupe JESUGO est composé de trois personnes qui sont des amies et habitent dans le même quartier. C'est la cinquième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Ildeverte est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Ildeverte est âgée de 48 ans et vit au Bénin. Ildeverte a arrêté l’école au niveau secondaire. Ildeverte est une veuve et mère d’un enfant scolarisé et à sa charge. Ildeverte vit seule avec son unique enfant. Ildeverte assure seule ses divers besoins et ceux de son enfant. Afin d'assurer les diverses charges de la maison, Ildeverte vend depuis une dizaine d’année de l’huile de palme et du tapioca à son domicile. Ildeverte s’approvisionne dans une région du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Ildeverte sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe JESUGO, un cinquième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les quatre premiers prêts ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The Jesugo group is made up of three persons who are friends and live in the same area. This is the fifth time this group is seeking financial support from ALIDé in order to increase the level of their activity.

The representative of the group, named Ildeverte, is the one whose hand is raised in the photo .
She is 48 years old and lives in Benin. She left school at the secondary level. She is a widow and is the mother of a child who attends school and is her dependent. She lives alone with her single child. Ildeverte provides alone for her various needs and those of her child. For the last ten years, in order to cover the various household expenses, she has been selling palm oil and tapioca from her home. She gets her supplies in an area of Benin.

Her objective is to meet her customers demand and increase her turnover and her income. to this end, Ildeverte, together with the other members of Jesugo group, is requesting a fifth loan from ALIDé. The first four loans have been fully repaid.

loans.use: to purchase palm oil and tapioca.

loans.name: Diana

texts.es: Diana, de 42 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora, amable y le gusta el negocio. Esta separada de su pareja pero vive con su hijo de 12 años de edad, habitando una casa que es de su propiedad. El trabajo al que se dedica es la venta de suplementos nutricionales, negocio que se inició hace un año y por medio de una amiga que le dio la oportunidad e integrar a éste trabajo. Ahora  ella misma trae desde la ciudad de Lima la mercadería para cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes, quienes previamente le hacen el pedido. Le gusta su negocio pues le ha traído muchas satisfacciones como el ayudar a muchas personas en el cuidado de su salud, también en su ingreso económico y el sentirse una empresaria que cada día más. Este será el primer préstamo con la institución MFP. Por ello espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Con el monto solicitado de 800 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la compra de productos nutricionales y medicinales en mayor volumen de estos productos y a menor costo, desea comprar la mayor variedad posible, de esa manera apoyar en el tratamiento de enfermedades de muchas personas.
texts.en:
Diana, 42, is a hard-working and kind woman who likes business.  She is separated from her partner but lives with her 12-year-old son in a house that is her property.  The work she does is selling nutritional supplements, a business she started a year ago through a friend who gave her the opportunity to join this business.  Now she herself brings the merchandise from the city of Lima to satisfy the demand of her customers, who order from her in advance.

She likes her job because it has brought her great satisfaction, such as helping a lot of people in their health care, in addition to her economic income and feeling like a business woman more every day.  This will be her first loan with the MFP institution, and she hopes for your collaboration so she can realize her plans.

With the requested loan of 800 PEN she will invest in buying nutritional and medicinal products wholesale and at a lower price.  She wants to buy the greatest variety possible so she can help treat the illnesses of many people.

loans.use: to buy nutritional products.

loans.name: Jesuvivi Group

texts.fr: Le groupe JESUVIVI est composé de trois personnes qui sont dans un même groupe de tontine et vendent toutes dans le même marché. C'est la quatrième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de leur activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Pauline est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Pauline est âgée de 44 ans et est mariée à un cuisinier du nom de Adrien. Pauline vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple a cinq enfants dont certains scolarisés et trois restent à leur charge. Les diverses charges de la maison sont assurées par le couple. Pour y parvenir, Pauline mène comme activité depuis une trentaine d’année environs la vente de la farine de manioc et de l’huile de palme. Pauline s’approvisionne dans une région du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaire et son revenu, Pauline sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe JESUVIVI, un quatrième crédit. Les trois premiers prêts ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: The group JESUVIVI is comprised of three persons who are in the same tontine (revolving credit association) and who all make their sales at the same market. This is the fourth time this group has requested financial aid from ALIDé to boost their business. The group's representative, Pauline, is the one in the photo with her hand raised. Pauline is 44 years old and married to a cook named Adrien. She lives together with her husband and children. The couple has five children, some of whom are in school. Three of the children are still dependents. The diverse household expenses are covered by the couple. To do so, Pauline has been running a business for about thirty years selling cassava flour and palm oil. She stocks up from a region in Benin. Seeking to satisfy her customers and to increase her sales and her revenues, Pauline and the other members of the group JESUVIVI are requesting a fourth loan. The first three loans were indeed repaid.

loans.use: to buy sacks of cassava flour and palm nuts to process

loans.name: Jesudjro 5 Group

texts.fr: Le groupe JESUDJRO 5 est composé de trois personnes qui sont issues de la même famille. C'est la cinquième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Lucie Adodo est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Lucie Adodo est âgée de 53 ans et vit au Bénin. Lucie Adodo n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Lucie Adodo est une veuve et est mère de huit enfants dont un reste à sa charge. Lucie Adodo vit seule avec son enfant à charge. Afin d'assurer ses diverses charges et ceux de son enfant, Lucie Adodo vend depuis vingt ans, divers articles (du savon, du biscuit et du lait) à son domicile.De façon secondaire, Lucie Adodo vend de la farine de manioc et du haricot. Lucie Adodo s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Lucie Adodo sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe JESUDJRO 5, un cinquième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les quatre premiers prêts ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The JESUDJRO 5 Group consists of three people who are part of the same family.  This is the fifth time that this group is seeking a loan from Alidé, so as to improve the standard of their business.  The representative of the group, named Lucie Adodo is the one with the raised hand in the photo.  Lucie Adodo is 53 years old and lives in Benin.

Lucie Adodo has not attended school.  Lucie Adodo is a widow and is the mother of eight children, one of which is still a dependent.  Lucie Adodo lives alone with the one child in her care.  In order to take care of her various responsibilities and those of her child, Lucie Adodo has for twenty years sold various products (soap, biscuits, and milk) at her home.  Secondly, Lucie Adodo sells beans and cassava flour.

Lucie Adodo stocks up at the market in Benin.  In order to better ensure customer satisfaction as well as to increase her turnover and profits, Lucie Adodo is requesting a loan along with the other members of the JESUDJRO 5 Group, their fifth loan from Alidé. The four previous loans were all repaid properly.

loans.use: to purchase cartons of soap, biscuits, and milk.

loans.name: Mamadou Maguette

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un jeune célibataire qui a arrêté ses études au collège faute de moyens pour les payer.Il s'est alors lancé dans la pêche. Il vit avec ses 4 frères et ses 3 sœurs chez son oncle. Son père vit à l'étranger et sa mère est décédée depuis 2008.Il a acquis une pirogue de pêche et passe souvent deux mois en mer pour se reposer deux semaine avant de repartir. Son activité lui procure des revenus assez importants avec lesquels il entretient sa famille et soutient aussi son oncle.Afin de renouveler son matériel , il sollicite un prêt de 450000frs pour acheter 30 balles de filets. Son ambition est de construire sa propre maison pour y loger sa famille.
texts.en:
The borrower is a young, single man who discontinued his studies in middle school due to an inability to pay for them.  Therefore, he started fishing.

He lives with his four brothers and three sisters in the house of his uncle.  His father lives abroad and his mother passed away in 2008.  He acquired a fishing boat, and often spends two months at sea with only two weeks to rest in between trips.

His business brings him important profits with which he takes care of his family while supporting his uncle.  In order to update his material, he is asking for a loan of 450,000 Frs. [XOF] in order to purchase thirty bails of netting. His goal is to build his own home in which to house his family.

loans.use: acheter 30 balles de filets

loans.name: Mayra Elena

texts.es: Mayra Elena es una emprendedora que ha salido adelante, ella  tiene 44 años de edad y su actividad económica a la que se dedica es la venta de mercadería en general. Uno de los sueños que ha tenido Mayra es de tener su propio negocio lo cual hoy en día se encuentra muy orgullosa porque lo pudo cumplir y además de poder generar ingresos para su familia. Mayra está solicitando crédito a Fundación León 2000, para poder invertir en su negocio en mercadería para comprar ropa para dama y caballero, ropa de niño, sandalias entre otro productos que sus clientes le están solicitando y darle un buen servicio ofreciéndole variedad de mercadería.
texts.en:
Mayra Elena is an entrepreneur who has gotten ahead.  She is 44, and she sells general merchandise.  One of Mayra’s dreams is to have her own business and now she is very proud because she was able to do it, as well as generating income for her family.
Mayra is requesting a loan from Foundation Leon 2000 for her business to buy women’s and men’s clothing, children’s clothing, sandals and other products for her customers.  They are requesting these items and she also wants to give good service by offering them a variety of merchandise.

loans.use: to buy women's and men's clothing, children's clothing, sandals and other items

loans.name: Sena 1 Group

texts.fr: Le groupe SENA 1 est composé de trois personnes qui appartiennent à un même groupe de tontine. C'est la troisième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante  du groupe, du nom de Antoinette Pélagie est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Antoinette Pélagie est âgée de 33 ans et vit au Bénin. Antoinette Pélagie n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Antoinette Pélagie est mariée à un certain Mathias. Le couple a quatre enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Antoinette Pélagie vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Afin de subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants, Antoinette Pélagie mène comme activité depuis une dizaine d’année, la vente d’ignames frites et non frites dans sa région. De façon secondaire, Antoinette Pélagie vend des tissus. Antoinette Pélagie s’approvisionne dons une ville du Bénin et dans sa région.
